232 int TombRaider::getNumAnimsForMoveable(int moveable_index)
233 {
234  /***************************************************************************
235  * It seems the number of animations isn't available in the moveable,
236  * so we have to calculate it:
237  * - Get the "# starting anim" for the next moveable (->N)
238  * - Substract the "# starting anim" for moveable to N
239  *
240  * Doing this, we assume that the next moveable has its animations following
241  * the animations of the current moveable (seems right for all tested
242  * levels, but...)
243  *
244  * We also have to deal with the fact that the next moveable
245  * could have "# starting anim" == -1
246  * (ie. anim handled by the engine, like the ponytail anim).
247  * If it's the case, we skip the moveable
248  * and use the next moveable for our computation
249  *
250  * - Mongoose, Notes I edited from TRViewer
251  **************************************************************************/
252 
253  int start_anim;
254  int next_start_anim = 0xFFFF;
255  tr2_moveable_t *last_moveable = 0x0;
256  tr2_moveable_t *moveable = 0x0;
257  tr2_moveable_t *next_moveable = 0x0;
258 
259 
260  if ((moveable_index >= 0 &&
261  moveable_index <= (int)_num_moveables) || _num_moveables < 1)
262  {
263  moveable = &_moveables[moveable_index];
264  }
265 
266  if (!moveable)
267  {
268  return -1; // Was 0
269  }
270 
271  last_moveable = &_moveables[moveable_index-1];
272 
273  start_anim = moveable->animation;
274 
275  while (moveable != last_moveable)
276  {
277  next_moveable = moveable + 1;
278  next_start_anim = next_moveable->animation;
279 
280  if (next_start_anim != 0xFFFF)
281  break;
282 
283  moveable = next_moveable++;
284  }
285 
286  if (moveable == last_moveable)
287  {
288  next_start_anim = _num_animations;
289  }
290 
291  return ((start_anim != 0xFFFF) ? next_start_anim - start_anim : 0);
292 }

352 unsigned char *TombRaider::SpecialTexTile(int texture)
353 {
354  unsigned char *image;
355  unsigned char *ptr;
356 
357 
358  image = NULL;
359 
360  if (texture >=0 && texture < NumSpecialTextures())
361  {
362  // Get base and offset into 32bit special textures/bump maps
363  ptr = _tex_special;
364  ptr += 256*256*4*texture;
365 
366  // Clone it as a single 256x256 @ 32bpp image
367  image = new unsigned char[256*256*4];
368  memcpy(image, ptr, 256*256*4);
369  }
370 
371  return image;
372 }

381 void TombRaider::Texture(int texture, unsigned char **image,
382  unsigned char **bumpmap)
383 {
384  int bumpmap_base = _num_room_textures + _num_misc_textures;
385 
386 
387  *image = getTexTile(texture);
388  *bumpmap = NULL;
389 
390  if (_num_bump_map_textures && texture >= bumpmap_base)
391  {
392  *bumpmap = getTexTile(texture + _num_bump_map_textures/2);
393  }
394 }

409 int TombRaider::checkMime(char *filename)
410 {
411  FILE *f;
412  unsigned int version;
413 
414 
415  if (!filename || !filename[0])
416  {
417  print("checkFile", "Given filename was empty string or NULL");
418  return -1;
419  }
420 
421  f = fopen(filename, "rb");
422 
423  if (!f)
424  {
425  perror(filename);
426  return -1;
427  }
428 
430  fread(&version, sizeof(version), 1, f);
431  fclose(f);
432 
433  switch (version)
434  {
435  case 0x00000020:
436  case 0x0000002d:
437  case 0xff080038:
438  case 0xff180038:
439  case 0xfffffff0: // bogus
440  case 0x00345254: // "TR4\0"
441  return 0;
442  default:
443  ;
444  }
445 
446  return 1;
447 }

449 
450 int TombRaider::Load(char *filename, void (*percent)(int))
451 {
452  FILE *f;
453  int i, j, l;
454  unsigned int num_mesh_data_words, num_mesh_pointers, data_size, data_offset;
455  unsigned int *mesh_pointer_list;
456  unsigned char *raw_mesh_data;
457  bool tr5;
458  long debugf;
459 
460 
461  f = fopen(filename, "rb");
462 
463  if (!f)
464  {
465  perror(filename);
466  return -1;
467  }
468 
469 
470  if (percent)
471  (*percent)(1);
472 
473  mReset = false;
474 
475  Fread(&mPakVersion, sizeof(mPakVersion), 1, f);
477 
478  printDebug("Load", "mPakVersion = %u", mPakVersion);
479 
480  tr5 = false;
481 
482  switch (mPakVersion)
483  {
484  case 0x00000020:
485  mEngineVersion = TR_VERSION_1;
486  break;
487  case 0x0000002d:
488  mEngineVersion = TR_VERSION_2;
489  break;
490  case 0xff080038:
491  case 0xff180038:
492  mEngineVersion = TR_VERSION_3;
493  break;
494  case 0xfffffff0: // bogus
495  case 0x00345254: // "TR4\0"
496  mEngineVersion = TR_VERSION_4;
497 
498  // Check to see if this is really a TR5 demo
499  l = strlen(filename);
500 
501  // Looking for pattern "filename.trc"
502  if ((filename[l-1] == 'c' || filename[l-1] == 'C') &&
503  (filename[l-2] == 'r' || filename[l-2] == 'R') &&
504  (filename[l-3] == 't' || filename[l-3] == 'T'))
505  {
506  printDebug("Load", "This is really a TR5 pak");
507  mEngineVersion = TR_VERSION_5;
508  return loadTR5(f, percent);
509  }
510 
511  break;
512  default:
513  mEngineVersion = TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN;
514  }
515 
516  if (percent)
517  (*percent)(5);
518 
519  printDebug("Load", "mEngineVersion = 0x%x", mPakVersion);
520 
521  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN)
522  return -1;
523 
524  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_4)
525  {
526 #ifdef ZLIB_SUPPORT
527  unsigned int sz, usz; // compressed and uncompressed size
528  unsigned char *compressed_data = NULL;
529  int zerr;
530  uLongf foo;
531 
532 
533  // Read texture type offsets
534  Fread(&_num_room_textures, 2, 1, f);
535  printDebug("LoadTR4", "_num_room_textures = %u", _num_room_textures);
536  Fread(&_num_misc_textures, 2, 1, f);
537  printDebug("LoadTR4", "_num_misc_textures = %u", _num_misc_textures);
538  Fread(&_num_bump_map_textures, 2, 1, f);
539  printDebug("LoadTR4", "_num_bump_map_textures = %u", _num_bump_map_textures);
540 
541  // Read the sizes of the 32-bit textures
542  Fread(&usz, sizeof(usz), 1, f);
543  Fread(&sz, sizeof(sz), 1, f);
544 
545  printDebug("Load", "TR4 32-bit textures compressed size = %u bytes", sz);
546  printDebug("Load", "TR4 32-bit textures uncompressed size = %u bytes", usz);
547 
548  _num_textiles = usz / sizeof(tr2_textile32_t);
549 
550  printDebug("LoadTR4", "_num_textiles = %i/%i = %i",
551  usz, sizeof(tr2_textile32_t), _num_textiles);
552 
553  _textile32 = new tr2_textile32_t[_num_textiles];
554 
555  // Allocate a temporary buffer for decompression
556  compressed_data = new unsigned char[sz];
557  Fread(compressed_data, sz, 1, f);
558 
559  // Decompress the textures
560  foo = usz;
561  zerr = uncompress((unsigned char *)_textile32,
562  &foo,
563  compressed_data,
564  sz);
565  usz = foo;
566 
567  if (percent)
568  (*percent)(6);
569 
570  printDebug("LoadTR4", "textile decompress [%s]",
571  (zerr == Z_OK) ? "OK" : "ERROR");
572 
573  switch (zerr)
574  {
575  case Z_MEM_ERROR:
576  printDebug("LoadTR4", "There was not enough memory");
577  break;
578  case Z_BUF_ERROR:
579  printDebug("LoadTR4", "There was not enough room in the output buffer");
580  break;
581  case Z_DATA_ERROR:
582  printDebug("LoadTR4", "The input data was corrupted");
583  break;
584  default:
585  printDebug("LoadTR4", "textile decompress %i", zerr);
586  }
587 
588  // Free the temporary buffer
589  delete [] compressed_data;
590 
591  // Read in the 16-bit textures, set NumTextiles
592  Fread(&usz, sizeof(usz), 1, f);
593  Fread(&sz, sizeof(sz), 1, f);
594 
595  printDebug("Load", "TR4 16-bit textures compressed size = %u bytes", sz);
596  printDebug("Load", "TR4 16-bit textures uncompressed size = %u bytes", usz);
597 
598  _num_textiles = usz / sizeof(tr2_textile16_t);
599 
600  printDebug("Load", "TR4 _num_textiles = %i/%i = %i",
601  usz, sizeof(tr2_textile16_t), _num_textiles);
602 
603  _textile16 = new tr2_textile16_t[_num_textiles];
604 
605  // Allocate a temporary buffer for decompression
606  compressed_data = new unsigned char[sz];
607  Fread(compressed_data, sz, 1, f);
608 
609  // Decompress the textures
610  foo = usz;
611  zerr = uncompress((unsigned char *)_textile16,
612  &foo,
613  compressed_data,
614  sz);
615  usz = foo;
616 
617  if (percent)
618  (*percent)(7);
619 
620  // printDebug("Load", "TR4 textile decompress [%s]",
621  // (zerr == Z_OK) ? "OK" : "ERROR");
622 
623  switch (zerr)
624  {
625  case Z_MEM_ERROR:
626  printDebug("Load", "TR4 textile decompress [ERROR]");
627  printDebug("Load", "TR4 There was not enough memory");
628  break;
629  case Z_BUF_ERROR:
630  printDebug("Load", "TR4 textile decompress [ERROR]");
631  printDebug("Load", "TR4 There was not enough room in the output buffer");
632  break;
633  case Z_DATA_ERROR:
634  printDebug("Load", "TR4 textile decompress [ERROR]");
635  printDebug("Load", "TR4 The input data was corrupted");
636  break;
637  case Z_OK:
638  printDebug("Load", "TR4 textile decompress [OK]");
639  break;
640  default:
641  printDebug("Load", "TR4 textile decompress %i", zerr);
642  }
643 
644  // Free the temporary buffer
645  delete [] compressed_data;
646 
647  // Read the sizes of the sprite textures
648  Fread(&usz, sizeof(usz), 1, f);
649  Fread(&sz, sizeof(sz), 1, f);
650 
651  printDebug("Load", "TR4 sprite textures compressed size = %u bytes", sz);
652  printDebug("Load", "TR4 sprite textures uncompressed size = %u bytes", usz);
653 
654  // Load sprite/bump map/gui/etc textures also
655  _num_tex_special = usz/(256*256*4);
656 
657  printDebug("LoadTR5", "_num_tex_special = %i/%i = %i",
658  usz, 256*256*4, _num_tex_special);
659 
660  printDebug("LoadTR5", "Reading %ibytes of sprite textures", usz);
661 
662  if (usz)
663  {
664  _tex_special = new unsigned char[usz];
665 
666  // Allocate a temporary buffer for decompression
667  compressed_data = new unsigned char[sz];
668  Fread(compressed_data, sz, 1, f);
669 
670  // Decompress the textures
671  foo = usz;
672  zerr = uncompress(_tex_special,
673  &foo,
674  compressed_data,
675  sz);
676  usz = foo;
677 
678  printDebug("LoadTR5", "special texture decompress [%s]",
679  (zerr == Z_OK) ? "OK" : "ERROR");
680 
681  switch (zerr)
682  {
683  case Z_MEM_ERROR:
684  printDebug("LoadTR5", "There was not enough memory");
685  break;
686  case Z_BUF_ERROR:
687  printDebug("LoadTR5", "There was not enough room in the output buffer");
688  break;
689  case Z_DATA_ERROR:
690  printDebug("LoadTR5", "The input data was corrupted");
691  break;
692  default:
693  printDebug("LoadTR5", "textile decompress %i", zerr);
694  }
695 
696  // Free the temporary buffer
697  delete [] compressed_data;
698  }
699 
700  if (percent)
701  (*percent)(9);
702 
703  // Read the sizes of the level data
704  Fread(&usz, sizeof(usz), 1, f);
705  Fread(&sz, sizeof(sz), 1, f);
706 
707  printDebug("Load", "TR4 level data compressed size = %u bytes", sz);
708  printDebug("Load", "TR4 level data uncompressed size = %u bytes", usz);
709 
710  // Allocate a temporary buffer for decompression
711  compressed_data = new unsigned char[sz];
712  Fread(compressed_data, sz, 1, f);
713  mCompressedLevelData = new unsigned char[usz];
714 
715  // Decompress the level data
716  foo = usz;
717  zerr = uncompress(mCompressedLevelData, &foo, compressed_data, sz);
718 
719  usz = foo;
720 
721  printDebug("Load", "TR4 level data decompress [%s]",
722  (zerr == Z_OK) ? "OK" : "ERROR");
723 
724  switch (zerr)
725  {
726  case Z_MEM_ERROR:
727  printDebug("Load", "TR4 There was not enough memory");
728  break;
729  case Z_BUF_ERROR:
730  printDebug("Load", "TR4 There was not enough room in the output buffer");
731  break;
732  case Z_DATA_ERROR:
733  printDebug("Load", "TR4 The input data was corrupted");
734  break;
735  }
736 
737  delete [] compressed_data;
738 
739  mCompressedLevelDataOffset = 0;
740  mCompressedLevelSize = usz;
741 
742  // Toggle Fread mode to read from decompressed data in memory, not diskfile
743  mFreadMode = TR_FREAD_COMPRESSED;
744 #else
745  Print("Load> ERROR: TR4 support not compiled in this build.");
746  Print("Load> Try 'make tr4' next build. Requires zlib.");
747  return -1;
748 #endif
749  }
750 
751  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_2 || mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_3)
752  {
753  /* Read the 8-bit palette */
754  Fread(_palette8, sizeof(tr2_colour_t), 256, f);
755 
756  /* Read 16-bit palette */
757  Fread(_palette16, sizeof(_palette16), 1, f);
758 
759  printDebug("Load", "Read TR 2|3 8bit and 16bit palettes");
760  }
761 
762  if (mEngineVersion != TR_VERSION_4)
763  {
764  /* Read the textiles */
765  Fread(&_num_textiles, sizeof(_num_textiles), 1, f);
766 
767  printDebug("Load", "_num_textiles = %i", _num_textiles);
768 
769  /* 8-bit textiles come first */
770  _textile8 = new tr2_textile8_t[_num_textiles];
771  Fread(_textile8, sizeof(tr2_textile8_t), _num_textiles, f);
772 
773  /* 16-bit textiles come second */
774  _textile16 = new tr2_textile16_t[_num_textiles];
775 
776  if (mEngineVersion != TR_VERSION_1)
777  {
779  Fread(_textile16, sizeof(tr2_textile16_t), _num_textiles, f);
780  printDebug("Load", "Read in 16bit texture tiles");
781  }
782  }
783 
784  if (percent)
785  (*percent)(10);
786 
787  /* 32-bit unknown - seems to always be 0 */
788  Fread(&_unknown_t, sizeof(_unknown_t), 1, f);
789  printDebug("Load", "_unknown_t = 0x%x", _unknown_t);
790 
791  /* Read raw room data */
793  Fread(&_num_rooms, sizeof(_num_rooms), 1, f);
794  printDebug("Load", "_num_rooms = %i", _num_rooms);
795 
796  data_size = _num_rooms * sizeof(tr2_room_t);
797  _rooms = new tr2_room_t[_num_rooms];
798 
799  /* Extract room details */
800  for (i = 0; i < _num_rooms; ++i)
801  {
802  if (percent)
803  {
804  (*percent)(11 + (int)(((float)i/(float)_num_rooms)*70.0));
805  }
806 
807  /* Read RoomInfo */
809  Fread(&_rooms[i].info, sizeof(tr2_room_info_t), 1, f);
810 
811  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].info =\n { x=%i, z=%i, yt=%i, yb=%i}",
812  i,
813  _rooms[i].info.x, _rooms[i].info.z,
814  _rooms[i].info.y_top, _rooms[i].info.y_bottom);
815 
816  /* Read raw data for rest of room */
817  Fread(&_rooms[i].num_data_words, sizeof(_rooms[i].num_data_words), 1, f);
818 
819  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].num_data_words = %u",
820  i, _rooms[i].num_data_words);
821 
822  _rooms[i].data = new unsigned char[_rooms[i].num_data_words*2];
823  Fread(_rooms[i].data, 2, _rooms[i].num_data_words, f);
824 
825  /* Identify vertices */
826  data_offset = 0;
828  _rooms[i].room_data.num_vertices = *(short *)(_rooms[i].data);
829 
830  data_offset += sizeof(_rooms[0].room_data.num_vertices);
831  data_size = _rooms[i].room_data.num_vertices * sizeof(tr2_vertex_room_t);
832 
833  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].room_data.num_vertices = %u",
834  i, _rooms[i].room_data.num_vertices);
835 
836  _rooms[i].room_data.vertices = 0x0;
837 
838  if (_rooms[i].room_data.num_vertices > 0)
839  {
840  _rooms[i].room_data.vertices =
841  new tr2_vertex_room_t[_rooms[i].room_data.num_vertices];
842 
843  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_1)
844  {
845  data_size = _rooms[i].room_data.num_vertices *
846  (sizeof(tr2_vertex_room_t) - 4);
847 
848  for (j = 0; j < _rooms[i].room_data.num_vertices; ++j)
849  {
850  memcpy(&_rooms[i].room_data.vertices[j],
851  _rooms[i].data + data_offset +
852  (j * (sizeof(tr2_vertex_room_t) - 4)),
853  sizeof(tr2_vertex_room_t) - 4);
854 
855  // ??? Adjust for what's missing?
856  _rooms[i].room_data.vertices[j].lighting2 =
857  _rooms[i].room_data.vertices[j].lighting1;
858  _rooms[i].room_data.vertices[j].attributes = 0;
859  }
860  }
861  else
862  {
863  memcpy(_rooms[i].room_data.vertices,
864  _rooms[i].data + data_offset, data_size);
865  }
866 
868  }
869 
870  data_offset += data_size;
871 
872  /* identify rectangles */
874  _rooms[i].room_data.num_rectangles =
875  *(short *)(_rooms[i].data + data_offset);
876 
877  data_offset += sizeof(_rooms[0].room_data.num_rectangles);
878  data_size = _rooms[i].room_data.num_rectangles * sizeof(tr2_quad_t);
879 
880  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].room_data.num_rectangles = %i",
881  i, _rooms[i].room_data.num_rectangles);
882 
883  _rooms[i].room_data.rectangles = 0x0;
884 
885  if (_rooms[i].room_data.num_rectangles > 0)
886  {
887  _rooms[i].room_data.rectangles =
888  new tr2_quad_t[_rooms[i].room_data.num_rectangles];
889  memcpy(_rooms[i].room_data.rectangles,
890  _rooms[i].data + data_offset, data_size);
891 
892  if (mEngineVersion >= TR_VERSION_3)
893  {
894  for (j = 0; j < _rooms[i].room_data.num_rectangles; ++j)
895  {
896  _rooms[i].room_data.rectangles[j].texture &= 0x7fff;
897  }
898  }
900  }
901 
902  data_offset += data_size;
903 
904  /* Identify triangles */
905  _rooms[i].room_data.num_triangles =
906  *(short *)(_rooms[i].data + data_offset);
908 
909  data_offset += sizeof(_rooms[0].room_data.num_triangles);
910  data_size = _rooms[i].room_data.num_triangles * sizeof(tr2_tri_t);
911 
912  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].room_data.num_triangles = %i",
913  i, _rooms[i].room_data.num_triangles);
914 
915  _rooms[i].room_data.triangles = 0x0;
916 
917  if (_rooms[i].room_data.num_triangles > 0)
918  {
919  _rooms[i].room_data.triangles =
920  new tr2_tri_t[_rooms[i].room_data.num_triangles];
921 
922  memcpy(_rooms[i].room_data.triangles,
923  _rooms[i].data + data_offset, data_size);
924 
925  if (mEngineVersion >= TR_VERSION_3)
926  {
927  for (j = 0; j < _rooms[i].room_data.num_triangles; ++j)
928  {
929  _rooms[i].room_data.triangles[j].texture &= 0x7fff;
930  }
932  }
933  }
934 
935  data_offset += data_size;
936 
937  /* Identify sprites */
938  _rooms[i].room_data.num_sprites =
939  *(short *)(_rooms[i].data + data_offset);
941 
942  data_offset += sizeof(_rooms[0].room_data.num_sprites);
943  data_size = _rooms[i].room_data.num_sprites * sizeof(tr2_room_sprite_t);
944 
945  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].room_data.num_sprites = %i",
946  i, _rooms[i].room_data.num_sprites);
947 
948  _rooms[i].room_data.sprites = 0x0;
949 
950  if (_rooms[i].room_data.num_sprites > 0)
951  {
952  _rooms[i].room_data.sprites =
953  new tr2_room_sprite_t[_rooms[i].room_data.num_sprites];
954  memcpy(_rooms[i].room_data.sprites,
955  _rooms[i].data + data_offset, data_size);
956 
957  if (mEngineVersion >= TR_VERSION_3)
958  {
959  for (j = 0; j < _rooms[i].room_data.num_sprites; j++)
960  {
961  _rooms[i].room_data.sprites[j].texture &= 0x7fff;
962  }
963  }
964 
966  }
967 
968  /* Free the raw room data */
969  delete [] _rooms[i].data;
970  _rooms[i].data = NULL;
971 
972  /* Read door info */
974  Fread(&_rooms[i].num_portals, sizeof(_rooms[0].num_portals), 1, f);
975 
976  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].num_portals = %i",
977  i, _rooms[i].num_portals);
978 
979  if (_rooms[i].num_portals > 0)
980  _rooms[i].portals = new tr2_room_portal_t[_rooms[i].num_portals];
981  else
982  _rooms[i].portals = 0;
983 
984  Fread(_rooms[i].portals, sizeof(tr2_room_portal_t),
985  _rooms[i].num_portals, f);
987 
988  /* Read sector info */
990  Fread(&_rooms[i].num_zsectors, sizeof(_rooms[0].num_zsectors), 1, f);
991  Fread(&_rooms[i].num_xsectors, sizeof(_rooms[0].num_xsectors), 1, f);
992 
993  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].num_zsectors = %i",
994  i, _rooms[i].num_zsectors);
995  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].num_xsectors = %i",
996  i, _rooms[i].num_xsectors);
997 
998  if (_rooms[i].num_zsectors > 0 && _rooms[i].num_xsectors > 0)
999  {
1000  _rooms[i].sector_list =
1001  new tr2_room_sector_t[_rooms[i].num_zsectors * _rooms[i].num_xsectors];
1002  }
1003  else
1004  {
1005  _rooms[i].sector_list = 0x0;
1006  }
1007 
1008  Fread(_rooms[i].sector_list, sizeof(tr2_room_sector_t),
1009  _rooms[i].num_zsectors * _rooms[i].num_xsectors, f);
1011 
1012  printDebug("Load", "Read %u room sectors",
1013  _rooms[i].num_zsectors * _rooms[i].num_xsectors);
1014 
1015  /* Read room lighting & mode */
1016  if (mEngineVersion >= TR_VERSION_3)
1017  {
1018  Fread(&_rooms[i].intensity1, 4, 1, f);
1019  // Fake TR2 record:
1020  _rooms[i].light_mode = 0;
1021  }
1022  else if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_1)
1023  {
1024  Fread(&_rooms[i].intensity1, 2, 1, f);
1025  // Is this intensity or LightMode?
1026 
1027  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].intensity1 = %u",
1028  i, _rooms[i].intensity1);
1029 
1030  _rooms[i].intensity2 = _rooms[i].intensity1;
1031  _rooms[i].light_mode = 0;
1032  }
1033  else
1034  { // TR2
1035  Fread(&_rooms[i].intensity1, 6, 1, f);
1036  printDebug("Load", "TR2 _rooms[%i].intensity1 = %u",
1037  i, _rooms[i].intensity1);
1038  }
1039 
1040  /* Read room lighting info */
1042  Fread(&_rooms[i].num_lights, sizeof(_rooms[i].num_lights), 1, f);
1043 
1044  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].num_lights = %u",
1045  i, _rooms[i].num_lights);
1046 
1047  _rooms[i].lights = 0x0;
1048  _rooms[i].tr4Lights = 0x0;
1049 
1050  // Mongoose 2002.04.03, New TR4 light struct, removed old
1051  // double size for others
1052  if (_rooms[i].num_lights > 0)
1053  {
1054  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_1)
1055  {
1056  _rooms[i].lights = new tr2_room_light_t[_rooms[i].num_lights];
1057 
1058  for (j = 0; j < _rooms[i].num_lights; ++j)
1059  {
1060  Fread(&_rooms[i].lights[j].x, sizeof(_rooms[0].lights[0].x), 3,f);
1061  // x, y, z
1062 
1063  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].lights[%i] = <%i %i %i>",
1064  i, j,
1065  _rooms[i].lights[j].x,
1066  _rooms[i].lights[j].y,
1067  _rooms[i].lights[j].z);
1068 
1069  Fread(&_rooms[i].lights[j].intensity1, sizeof(short), 1, f);
1070  // Intensity1
1071 
1072  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].lights[%i].intensity1 = %u",
1073  i, j,
1074  _rooms[i].lights[j].intensity1);
1075 
1076  _rooms[i].lights[j].intensity2 = _rooms[i].lights[j].intensity1;
1077  Fread(&_rooms[i].lights[j].fade1, sizeof(unsigned int), 1, f);
1078  // Fade1
1079 
1080  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].lights[%i].fade1 = %u",
1081  i, j,
1082  _rooms[i].lights[j].fade1);
1083 
1084  _rooms[i].lights[j].fade2 = _rooms[i].lights[j].fade1;
1085  }
1086  }
1087  else if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_4)
1088  {
1089  _rooms[i].tr4Lights = new tr4_room_light_t[_rooms[i].num_lights];
1090 
1091  Fread(_rooms[i].tr4Lights, sizeof(tr4_room_light_t),
1092  _rooms[i].num_lights, f);
1093  }
1094  else
1095  {
1096  _rooms[i].lights = new tr2_room_light_t[_rooms[i].num_lights];
1097 
1098  Fread(_rooms[i].lights, sizeof(tr2_room_light_t),
1099  _rooms[i].num_lights, f);
1100  }
1101  }
1103 
1104  /* Read Static Mesh Data */
1105  Fread(&_rooms[i].num_static_meshes, sizeof(unsigned short), 1, f);
1107 
1108  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].num_static_meshes = %u",
1109  i, _rooms[i].num_static_meshes);
1110 
1111  _rooms[i].static_meshes = 0x0;
1112 
1113  if (_rooms[i].num_static_meshes > 0)
1114  {
1115  _rooms[i].static_meshes =
1116  new tr2_room_staticmesh_t[_rooms[i].num_static_meshes];
1117 
1118  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_1)
1119  {
1120  for (j = 0; j < _rooms[i].num_static_meshes; j++)
1121  {
1122  Fread(&_rooms[i].static_meshes[j], 18, 1, f);
1123  // Account for the missing .intensity2
1124 
1125  _rooms[i].static_meshes[j].object_id =
1126  _rooms[i].static_meshes[j].intensity2;
1127 
1128  _rooms[i].static_meshes[j].intensity2 =
1129  _rooms[i].static_meshes[j].intensity1;
1130  }
1131  }
1132  else
1133  {
1134  Fread(_rooms[i].static_meshes, sizeof(tr2_room_staticmesh_t),
1135  _rooms[i].num_static_meshes, f);
1136  }
1137  }
1139 
1140  Fread(&_rooms[i].alternate_room, sizeof(short), 1, f);
1142 
1143  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].alternate_room = %i",
1144  i, _rooms[i].alternate_room);
1145 
1146  Fread(&_rooms[i].flags, sizeof(short), 1, f);
1148 
1149  printDebug("Load", "_rooms[%i].flags = 0x%x",
1150  i, _rooms[i].flags);
1151 
1152  /* Read TR3 room light colour */
1153  if (mEngineVersion >= TR_VERSION_3)
1154  {
1155  /* we force this to be 3 bytes
1156  (instead of just sizeof(room_light_colour))
1157  for Macs and others that can't handle odd-length structures...
1158  */
1159  Fread(&_rooms[i].room_light_colour, 3, 1, f);
1160  printDebug("Load", "TR3 _rooms[%i].room_light_colour {%i %i %i}",
1161  i,
1162  _rooms[i].room_light_colour.r,
1163  _rooms[i].room_light_colour.g,
1164  _rooms[i].room_light_colour.b);
1165  }
1166  }
1167 
1168  /* Read floor data */
1169  /*
1170  * Really, FloorData should be a per-sector dynamic allocation; however,
1171  * that requires a parser that can accurately determine where one sector's
1172  * FloorData ends and another's begins. Until we have that, we'll stick to
1173  * this crude (but effective) method...
1174  */
1175  Fread(&_num_floor_data, sizeof(_num_floor_data), 1, f);
1176  printDebug("Load", "_num_floor_data = %u", _num_floor_data);
1177 
1178  _floor_data = 0x0;
1179 
1180  if (_num_floor_data > 0)
1181  {
1182  _floor_data = new unsigned short[_num_floor_data];
1183  Fread(_floor_data, sizeof(short), _num_floor_data, f);
1185  }
1186 
1187  /* Read mesh data */
1188  Fread(&num_mesh_data_words, sizeof(num_mesh_data_words), 1, f);
1190 
1191  printDebug("Load", "num_mesh_data_words = %u", num_mesh_data_words);
1192 
1193  raw_mesh_data = new unsigned char[num_mesh_data_words*2];
1194  Fread(raw_mesh_data, 2, num_mesh_data_words, f);
1195  // Endian-conversion of this data occurs in ExtractMeshes()
1196 
1197  printDebug("Load", "Read raw_mesh_data");
1198 
1199  /* Read mesh pointers */
1200  Fread(&num_mesh_pointers, sizeof(num_mesh_pointers), 1, f);
1202 
1203  printDebug("Load", "num_mesh_pointers = %u", num_mesh_pointers);
1204 
1205  mesh_pointer_list = new unsigned int[num_mesh_pointers];
1206  Fread(mesh_pointer_list, sizeof(unsigned int), num_mesh_pointers, f);
1208 
1209  printDebug("Load", "Read mesh_pointer_list");
1210 
1211  /* Extract meshes */
1212  extractMeshes(raw_mesh_data, num_mesh_pointers, mesh_pointer_list);
1213  delete [] raw_mesh_data;
1214  delete [] mesh_pointer_list;
1215 
1216  /* Read animations */
1217  Fread(&_num_animations, sizeof(_num_animations), 1, f);
1219 
1220  printDebug("Load", "_num_animations = %u", _num_animations);
1221 
1222  _animations = 0x0;
1223 
1224  if (_num_animations > 0)
1225  {
1226  _animations = new tr2_animation_t[_num_animations];
1227 
1228  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_4)
1229  {
1230  tr4_animation_t tr4_anim;
1231

1233  {
1234  Fread(&tr4_anim, 40, 1, f);
1235 
1236  _animations[i].frame_offset = tr4_anim.frame_offset;
1237  _animations[i].frame_rate = tr4_anim.frame_rate;
1238  _animations[i].frame_size = tr4_anim.frame_size;
1239  _animations[i].state_id = tr4_anim.state_id;
1240  _animations[i].unknown1 = tr4_anim.unknown;
1241  _animations[i].unknown2 = tr4_anim.speed;
1242  _animations[i].unknown3 = tr4_anim.accel_lo;
1243  _animations[i].unknown4 = tr4_anim.accel_hi;
1244  _animations[i].frame_start = tr4_anim.frame_start;
1245  _animations[i].frame_end = tr4_anim.frame_end;
1246  _animations[i].next_animation = tr4_anim.next_animation;

1248  _animations[i].num_state_changes = tr4_anim.num_state_changes;

1250  _animations[i].num_anim_commands = (tr4_anim.num_anim_commands > 256)

1253  }

1255  else

1258  }

1265 
1266 
1267  if (percent)

1331 
1332  _frames = 0x0;
1333 
1334  if (_num_frames > 0)
1335  {
1336  _frames = new unsigned short[_num_frames];
1337  Fread(_frames, 2, _num_frames, f);
1339 
1340  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_1)
1341  {
1342  // re-format the frames[] to look like TR2 frames
1343  int num_frames;
1344 
1345  for (j = 0; j < (int)_num_animations; ++j)
1346  {
1347  int fo = _animations[j].frame_offset / 2;
1348  _animations[j].frame_size = (_frames[fo + 9] * 2) + 10;
1349  }
1350 
1351  for (i = 0; i < (int)_num_frames; )
1352  {
1353  i += 9; // point to num_frames;
1354  j = i; // get rid of (overwrite) num_frames
1355  num_frames = _frames[i++];
1356 
1357  while (num_frames--)
1358  {
1359  _frames[j++] = _frames[i + 1]; // reverse the words as we go
1360  _frames[j++] = _frames[i];
1361  i += 2;
1362  }
1363  }
1364  }
1365  }

1397 
1398  _object_textures = 0x0;
1399 
1400  if (mEngineVersion < TR_VERSION_3)
1401  {

1416 
1417 
1418  if (percent)
1419  (*percent)(90);

1609  Fread(&_num_animated_textures, sizeof(_num_animated_textures), 1, f);

1616  {

1620  }

1622  if (mEngineVersion >= TR_VERSION_3)
1623  {
1624  /* Read object textures */
1625  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_4)
1626  {
1627  unsigned char zzbuf[5];
1628  Fread(zzbuf, 1, 4, f); // skip "TEX"
1630  zzbuf[4] = 0;
1631  printDebug("Load", "TR4 checking %s == TEX", zzbuf);
1632  }

1638 
1639  _object_textures = 0x0;
1640 
1641  if (_num_object_textures > 0)
1642  {
1643  // Used to be 2 * num, and I forgot why...
1644  _object_textures = new tr2_object_texture_t[_num_object_textures];
1645 
1647  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_4)
1648  {
1649  int jjj, kkk;
1650  tr4_object_texture_t *tr4_tex;
1651 
1652 
1653  tr4_tex = new tr4_object_texture_t[_num_object_textures];
1654 
1655  Fread(tr4_tex, 38, _num_object_textures, f);
1656 
1657  for (jjj = 0; jjj < (int)_num_object_textures; ++jjj)
1658  {
1659  _object_textures[jjj].transparency_flags =
1660  tr4_tex[jjj].attribute;
1661 
1662  _object_textures[jjj].tile =
1663  (unsigned short)tr4_tex[jjj].tile & 0x7fff;
1664 
1665  for (kkk = 0; kkk < 4; ++kkk)
1666  {
1667  _object_textures[jjj].vertices[kkk].xcoordinate =
1668  tr4_tex[jjj].vertices[kkk].xcoordinate;
1669  _object_textures[jjj].vertices[kkk].xpixel =
1670  tr4_tex[jjj].vertices[kkk].xpixel;
1671  _object_textures[jjj].vertices[kkk].ycoordinate =
1672  tr4_tex[jjj].vertices[kkk].ycoordinate;
1673  _object_textures[jjj].vertices[kkk].ypixel =
1674  tr4_tex[jjj].vertices[kkk].ypixel;
1675  }
1676  }
1677

1679  }
1680  else
1681  {
1682  Fread(_object_textures, sizeof(tr2_object_texture_t),
1683  _num_object_textures, f);
1684  }
1685  }
1687  }

1690  Fread(&_num_items, sizeof(_num_items), 1, f);
1692  printDebug("Load", "_num_items = %i", _num_items);
1693 
1694  _items = 0x0;
1695 
1696  if (_num_items > 0)
1697  {
1698  _items = new tr2_item_t[_num_items];
1699 
1700  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_1)
1701  {
1702  for (i = 0; i < _num_items; ++i)
1703  {
1704  Fread(&_items[i], sizeof(tr2_item_t) - 2, 1, f);
1705  _items[i].flags = _items[i].intensity2;
1706  _items[i].intensity2 = _items[i].intensity1;
1707  }
1708  }
1709  else
1710  {
1711  Fread(_items, sizeof(tr2_item_t), _num_items, f);
1712  }
1713  }
1715 
1716  /* Read LightMaps */
1717  _light_map = new unsigned char[32 * 256];
1718 
1719  if (mEngineVersion != TR_VERSION_4)
1720  {
1721  Fread(_light_map, 32, 256, f);
1722  }
1723 
1724  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_1)
1725  {
1726  /* read the 8-bit palette */
1727  Fread(_palette8, sizeof(tr2_colour_t), 256, f);
1728  printDebug("Load", "Read TR 1 palette");
1729 
1730  // build 16-bit textiles from 8-bit
1731  // (no extra colours, but creates consistent .TR2 file)
1732  for (i = 0; i < (int)_num_textiles; ++i)
1733  {
1734  unsigned short argb;
1735  double colour_tmp;
1736 
1737  for (j = 0; j < (256 * 256); ++j)
1738  {
1739  colour_tmp = _palette8[_textile8[i].tile[j]].r & 0x3f;
1740  colour_tmp = colour_tmp * 31.0 / 63.0;
1741  argb = ((int)colour_tmp) << 10;
1742  colour_tmp = _palette8[_textile8[i].tile[j]].g & 0x3f;
1743  colour_tmp = colour_tmp * 31.0 / 63.0;
1744  argb |= ((int)colour_tmp) << 5;
1745  colour_tmp = _palette8[_textile8[i].tile[j]].b & 0x3f;
1746  colour_tmp = colour_tmp * 31.0 / 63.0;
1747  argb |= ((int)colour_tmp);
1748  argb &= 0x7fff; // ???
1749 
1750  if (_textile8[i].tile[j] != 0)
1751  argb |= 0x8000;
1752 
1753  _textile16[i].tile[j] = argb;
1754  }
1755  }
1756  }
1757 
1758  /* Read cinematic frames */
1759  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_4)
1760  {
1761  unsigned int num_ai_data;
1762 
1763 
1764  Fread(&num_ai_data, 4, 1, f);
1765  printDebug("Load", "num_ai_data = %i", num_ai_data);
1766 
1767  tr4_ai_object_t *ai_obj = 0x0;
1768 
1769  if (num_ai_data > 0)
1770  {
1771  ai_obj = new tr4_ai_object_t[num_ai_data];
1772  Fread(ai_obj, sizeof(tr4_ai_object_t), num_ai_data, f);
1773 
1774  delete [] ai_obj;
1775  }
1776  }
1777  else
1778  {
1779  unsigned short num_cinematic_frames;
1780 
1781  Fread(&num_cinematic_frames, sizeof(num_cinematic_frames), 1, f);
1783 
1784  _num_cinematic_frames = num_cinematic_frames;
1785 
1786  printDebug("Load", "_num_cinematic_frames = %i", _num_cinematic_frames);
1787 
1788  _cinematic_frames = 0x0;
1789 
1790  if (_num_cinematic_frames > 0)
1791  {
1792  _cinematic_frames = new tr2_cinematic_frame_t[_num_cinematic_frames];
1793 
1794  Fread(_cinematic_frames, sizeof(tr2_cinematic_frame_t),
1795  _num_cinematic_frames, f);
1796  // There may or may not be endian conversion required here - I have
1797  // no idea what this data is.
1798  }
1799  }
1800 
1801  /* Read demodata (?) */
1802  Fread(&_num_demo_data, sizeof(_num_demo_data), 1, f);
1804  printDebug("Load", "_num_demo_data = %i", _num_demo_data);
1805 
1806  _demo_data = 0x0;
1807 
1808  if (_num_demo_data > 0)
1809  {
1810  _demo_data = new unsigned char[_num_demo_data];
1811  Fread(_demo_data, 1, _num_demo_data, f);
1812  // There may or may not be endian conversion required here - I have
1813  // no idea what this data is.
1814  }
1815 
1816  /* Read SoundMap */
1817  mSoundMap = new short[370];
1818 
1819  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_1)
1820  {
1821  Fread(mSoundMap, sizeof(short), 256, f);
1822  //memset(_sound_map, 0, 370 * sizeof(short)); //! \fixme KLUDGE!!!
1823  }
1824  else
1825  {
1826  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_4)
1827  {
1828  Fread(mSoundMap, sizeof(short), 370, f);
1829  }
1830  else
1831  {
1832  Fread(mSoundMap, sizeof(short), 370, f);
1833  }
1834  }
1836 
1837  /* Read SoundDetails */
1838  Fread(&mNumSoundDetails, sizeof(mNumSoundDetails), 1, f);
1839  printDebug("Load", "mNumSoundDetails = %i", mNumSoundDetails);
1841 
1842  mSoundDetails = 0x0;
1843 
1844  if (mNumSoundDetails > 0)
1845  {
1846  mSoundDetails = new tr2_sound_details_t[mNumSoundDetails];
1847  Fread(mSoundDetails, sizeof(tr2_sound_details_t), mNumSoundDetails, f);
1848  }
1850 
1851  // Read sound sample indices
1852  mSampleIndices = 0x0;
1853  mNumSampleIndices = 0;
1854  mRiffDataSz = 0;
1855  mRiffData = 0x0;
1856  mNumTR4Samples = 0;
1857  mTR4Samples = 0x0;
1858 
1859  switch (mEngineVersion)
1860  {
1861  case TR_VERSION_1:
1862  Fread(&mRiffDataSz, 4, 1, f);
1863  printDebug("Load", "mRiffDataSz = %ibytes", mRiffDataSz);
1864 
1865  if (mRiffDataSz > 0)
1866  {
1867  mRiffData = new unsigned char[mRiffDataSz];
1868  Fread(mRiffData, 1, mRiffDataSz, f);
1869  }
1870 
1871  Fread(&mNumSampleIndices, 4, 1, f);
1872  printDebug("Load", "mNumSampleIndices = %i", mNumSampleIndices);
1873 
1874  if (mNumSampleIndices > 0)
1875  {
1876  mSampleIndices = new int[mNumSampleIndices];
1878  Fread(mSampleIndices, 4, mNumSampleIndices, f);
1879  }
1880  break;
1881  case TR_VERSION_4:
1882  mFreadMode = TR_FREAD_NORMAL;
1883  // 0x46464952
1884 
1886  Fread(&mNumTR4Samples, 4, 1, f);
1887  printDebug("Load", "mNumTR4Samples = %i", mNumTR4Samples);
1888 
1889  mRiffDataSz = 0;
1890  mTR4Samples = new unsigned char *[mNumTR4Samples];
1891  mTR4SamplesSz = new unsigned int[mNumTR4Samples];
1892 
1893  memset(mTR4SamplesSz, 0, mNumTR4Samples*4);
1894 
1895  for (i = 0; i < (int)mNumTR4Samples; ++i)
1896  {
1897  unsigned int sizeCompressed;
1898  unsigned int sizeUncompressed;
1899  unsigned char *compressedSoundSample;
1900  unsigned char *unCompressedSoundSample;
1901  int zErr;
1902  uLongf libzUncompressedSize;
1903 
1904 
1905  Fread(&sizeUncompressed, 4, 1, f);
1906  printDebug("Load", " sizeUncompressed = %i", sizeUncompressed);
1907  Fread(&sizeCompressed, 4, 1, f);
1908  printDebug("Load", " sizeCompressed = %i", sizeCompressed);
1909 
1910  compressedSoundSample = new unsigned char[sizeCompressed];
1911  unCompressedSoundSample = new unsigned char[sizeUncompressed];
1912 
1913  //printDebug("Load", " %lubytes read from file", ftell(f));
1914  Fread(compressedSoundSample, sizeCompressed, 1, f);
1915 
1916  printDebug("Load", " %c%c%c%c should be RIFF",
1917  compressedSoundSample[0],
1918  compressedSoundSample[1],
1919  compressedSoundSample[2],
1920  compressedSoundSample[3]);
1921 
1922  //#define NEVER_DECOMPRESS
1923 #ifdef NEVER_DECOMPRESS
1924  mTR4Samples[i] = compressedSoundSample;
1925  mTR4SamplesSz[i] = sizeCompressed;
1926 
1927  delete [] unCompressedSoundSample;
1928 #else
1929  // Decompress the sample
1930  libzUncompressedSize = sizeUncompressed;
1931 
1932  zErr = uncompress(unCompressedSoundSample,
1933  &libzUncompressedSize,
1934  compressedSoundSample,
1935  sizeCompressed);
1936 
1937  sizeUncompressed = libzUncompressedSize;
1938 
1939  switch (zErr)
1940  {
1941  case Z_MEM_ERROR:
1942  printDebug("Load", " Decompress Error: not enough memory");
1943  break;
1944  case Z_BUF_ERROR:
1945  printDebug("Load", " Decompress Error: output buffer too small");
1946  break;
1947  case Z_DATA_ERROR:
1948  printDebug("Load", " Decompress Error: input data was corrupted");
1949  break;
1950  case Z_OK:
1951  printDebug("Load", " Decompress OK");
1952  break;
1953  default:
1954  printDebug("Load", " Decompress Error: decompress error #%i", zErr);
1955  }
1956 
1957  // Hhhmm... handle uncompressed RIFFs too?
1958  if (zErr == Z_OK)
1959  {
1960  mTR4Samples[i] = unCompressedSoundSample;
1961  mTR4SamplesSz[i] = sizeUncompressed;
1962  delete [] compressedSoundSample;
1963  }
1964  else
1965  {
1966  printDebug("Load", " %lubytes read from file", ftell(f));
1967  mTR4Samples[i] = compressedSoundSample;
1968  mTR4SamplesSz[i] = sizeCompressed;
1969  delete [] unCompressedSoundSample;
1970  }
1971 #endif
1972  }
1973  break;
1974  case TR_VERSION_2:
1975  case TR_VERSION_3:
1976  case TR_VERSION_5:
1977  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
1978  default:
1980  Fread(&mNumSampleIndices, 4, 1, f);
1981  printDebug("Load", "mNumSampleIndices = %i", mNumSampleIndices);
1982  if (mNumSampleIndices > 0)
1983  {
1984  mSampleIndices = new int[mNumSampleIndices];
1986  Fread(mSampleIndices, 4, mNumSampleIndices, f);
1987  }
1988  break;
1989  }
1990 
1991 #ifdef ZLIB_SUPPORT
1992  if (mCompressedLevelData)
1993  {
1994  printDebug("Load", "Freeing uncompressed TR4 data");
1995  delete [] mCompressedLevelData;
1996  }
1997 
1999  mCompressedLevelData = NULL;
2000 #endif
2001 
2002  fclose(f);
2003 
2004  if (percent)
2005  (*percent)(100);
2006 
2007  return 0;
2008 }

2015 float TombRaider::adjustTexel(unsigned char texel, char offset)
2016 {
2017  if (offset >= 0)
2018  texel++;
2019  else
2020  texel--;
2021 
2022  return ((float)texel / 255.0);
2023 }
2024 
2025 
2026 void TombRaider::computeRotationAngles(unsigned short **frame,
2027  unsigned int *frame_offset,
2028  unsigned int *angle_offset,
2029  float *x, float *y, float *z)
2030 {
2031  unsigned short itmp, itmp2;
2032  double angle;
2033 
2034 
2035  itmp = (*frame)[(*frame_offset) + (*angle_offset)++];
2036 
2037  if (Engine() == TR_VERSION_1)
2038  {
2039  // All angles are three-axis
2040  angle = (itmp >> 4) & 0x03ff;
2041  angle *= 360.0 / 1024.0;
2042  *x = angle;
2043 
2044  itmp2 = (itmp << 6) & 0x03c0;
2045 
2046  // Get Z rotation
2047  itmp = (*frame)[(*frame_offset) + (*angle_offset)];
2048  ++(*angle_offset);
2049 
2050  itmp2 |= (itmp >> 10) & 0x003f;
2051  angle = itmp2;
2052  angle *= 360.0 / 1024.0;
2053  *y = angle;
2054 
2055  angle = itmp & 0x3ff;
2056  angle *= 360.0 / 1024.0;
2057  *z = angle;
2058  }
2059  else if (itmp & 0xc000)
2060  {
2061  // TR2, TR3, TR4 - single axis of rotation
2062  if (Engine() == TR_VERSION_4)
2063  {
2064  angle = itmp & 0x0fff;
2065  angle /= 4096.0;
2066  angle *= 360.0;
2067  }
2068  else
2069  {
2070  angle = itmp & 0x3ff;
2071  angle /= 1024.0;
2072  angle *= 360.0;
2073  }
2074 
2075  switch (itmp & 0xc000)
2076  {
2077  case 0x4000:
2078  *x = angle;
2079  break;
2080  case 0x8000:
2081  *y = angle;
2082  break;
2083  case 0xc000:
2084  *z = angle;
2085  break;
2086  }
2087  }
2088  else // TR2, TR3, TR4 - three axes
2089  {
2090  angle = (itmp >> 4) & 0x03ff;
2091  angle *= 360.0 / 1024.0;
2092  *x = angle;
2093 
2094  itmp2 = (itmp << 6) & 0x03c0;
2095  itmp = (*frame)[(*frame_offset) + (*angle_offset)++]; // get Z rotation
2096 
2097  itmp2 |= (itmp >> 10) & 0x003f;
2098  angle = itmp2;
2099  angle *= 360.0 / 1024.0;
2100  *y = angle;
2101 
2102  angle = itmp & 0x3ff;
2103  angle *= 360.0 / 1024.0;
2104  *z = angle;
2105  }
2106 }
2107 
2108 
2109 void TombRaider::computeUV(tr2_object_texture_vert_t *st, float *u, float *v)
2110 {
2111  unsigned char x, y;
2112 
2113 
2114  if (!st || !u || !v)
2115  return;
2116 
2117  x = st->xpixel;
2118  y = st->ypixel;
2119 
2120  x += (char)st->xcoordinate;
2121  y += (char)st->ycoordinate;
2122 
2123  //x += ((char)st->xcoordinate >= 0) ? 1 : -1;

2137 void TombRaider::getColor(int index, float color[4])
2138 {
2139  switch (getEngine())
2140  {
2141  case TR_VERSION_1:
2142  color[0] = _palette8[index].r / 64.0;
2143  color[1] = _palette8[index].g / 64.0;
2144  color[2] = _palette8[index].b / 64.0;
2145  //color[0] = (_palette8[index].r & 0xfd) / 64.0;
2146  //color[1] = (_palette8[index].g & 0xfd) / 64.0;
2147  //color[2] = (_palette8[index].b & 0xfd) / 64.0;
2148  color[3] = 1.0;
2149  break;
2150  case TR_VERSION_2:
2151  case TR_VERSION_3:
2152  case TR_VERSION_4:
2153  case TR_VERSION_5:
2154  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
2155  default:
2156  color[0] = (float)(_palette16[index] & 0xff) / 256.0;
2157  color[1] = (float)((_palette16[index] >> 8) & 0xff) / 256.0;
2158  color[2] = (float)((_palette16[index] >> 16) & 0xff) / 256.0;
2159  color[3] = 1.0;
2160  }
2161 }

2273 void TombRaider::getMeshTexturedRectangle(unsigned int meshIndex,

2276  unsigned short *transparency)
2277 {
2278  unsigned int t1_1, t1_2, t1_3, t2_1, t2_2, t2_3;
2279  static bool givenWarning = false; // hahaha... okay less spewing
2280  tr2_mesh_t *meshes;
2281  tr2_object_texture_t *object_texture;
2282  int t_index;
2283  unsigned int i, m;
2284 
2285

2287  {
2288  print("getMeshTexturedRectangle", "Assertion error: invalid mesh index\n");
2289  return;
2290  }
2291 
2292  m = meshIndex; // lazy
2293  meshes = mMeshes; // lazy
2294  object_texture = _object_textures; // lazy
2295  i = faceIndex; // lazy
2296 
2297  // Make 2 triangles from one quad!
2298  t1_1 = 0;
2299  t1_2 = 1;
2300  t1_3 = 2;
2301 
2302  t2_1 = 3;
2303  t2_2 = 0;
2304  t2_3 = 2;
2305 
2306  t_index = meshes[m].textured_rectangles[i].texture;
2307 
2308  index[0] = meshes[m].textured_rectangles[i].vertices[t1_1];
2309  index[1] = meshes[m].textured_rectangles[i].vertices[t1_2];
2310  index[2] = meshes[m].textured_rectangles[i].vertices[t1_3];
2311  index[3] = meshes[m].textured_rectangles[i].vertices[t2_1];
2312  index[4] = meshes[m].textured_rectangles[i].vertices[t2_2];
2313  index[5] = meshes[m].textured_rectangles[i].vertices[t2_3];
2314 
2315  computeUV(object_texture[t_index].vertices+t1_1, (st), (st)+1);
2316  computeUV(object_texture[t_index].vertices+t1_2, (st)+2, (st)+3);
2317  computeUV(object_texture[t_index].vertices+t1_3, (st)+4, (st)+5);
2318  computeUV(object_texture[t_index].vertices+t2_1, (st)+6, (st)+7);
2319  computeUV(object_texture[t_index].vertices+t2_2, (st)+8, (st)+9);
2320  computeUV(object_texture[t_index].vertices+t2_3, (st)+10, (st)+11);
2321 
2322  *texture = object_texture[t_index].tile;
2323  *transparency = object_texture[t_index].transparency_flags;
2324 
2325  // TR3+ alpha Textured polygons
2326  if (!givenWarning && *transparency == 2)
2327  {
2328  givenWarning = true;
2329 
2331  // (partial alpha)
2332  print("getMeshTexturedRectangle",
2333  "TR3+ greyscale alpha intensity not implmented, %s:%i",
2334  __FILE__, __LINE__);
2335  }

2441 void TombRaider::getMeshVertexArrays(unsigned int meshIndex,
2442  unsigned int *vertexCount, float **verts,
2443  unsigned int *normalCount, float **norms,
2444  unsigned int *colorCount, float **colors)
2445 {
2446  unsigned int i;
2447  float colorValue;
2448 
2449 
2450  *vertexCount = 0;
2451  *verts = 0x0;
2452  *normalCount = 0;
2453  *norms = 0x0;
2454  *colorCount = 0;
2455  *colors = 0x0;
2456 
2457  if ((int)meshIndex > mMeshCount || mMeshes[meshIndex].num_vertices < 0)
2458  return;
2459 
2460  // Vertices
2461  *vertexCount = mMeshes[meshIndex].num_vertices;
2462  *verts = new float[*vertexCount * 3];
2463 
2464  for (i = 0; i < *vertexCount; ++i)
2465  {
2466  (*verts)[i*3] = mMeshes[meshIndex].vertices[i].x;
2467  (*verts)[i*3+1] = mMeshes[meshIndex].vertices[i].y;
2468  (*verts)[i*3+2] = mMeshes[meshIndex].vertices[i].z;
2469  }
2470 
2471 
2472  // Normals, if any
2473  if (mMeshes[meshIndex].num_normals > 0 &&
2474  mMeshes[meshIndex].normals &&
2475  mMeshes[meshIndex].num_normals == mMeshes[meshIndex].num_vertices)
2476  {
2477  *normalCount = mMeshes[meshIndex].num_vertices;
2478  *norms = new float[*normalCount * 3];
2479 
2480  for (i = 0; i < *normalCount; ++i)
2481  {
2482  (*norms)[i*3] = mMeshes[meshIndex].normals[i].x;
2483  (*norms)[i*3+1] = mMeshes[meshIndex].normals[i].y;
2484  (*norms)[i*3+2] = mMeshes[meshIndex].normals[i].z;
2485  }
2486  }
2487  // Vertex lighting/colors, if any
2488  else if (mMeshes[meshIndex].num_vertices > 0 &&
2489  mMeshes[meshIndex].mesh_lights)
2490  {
2491  *colorCount = mMeshes[meshIndex].num_vertices;
2492 
2493 #ifdef MESH_COLORS_SHOULD_BR_RGBA
2494  *colors = new float[*colorCount * 4];
2495 #else
2496  *colors = new float[*colorCount];
2497 #endif
2498 
2499  for (i = 0; i < *colorCount; ++i)
2500  {
2501  colorValue = mMeshes[meshIndex].mesh_lights[i];
2502 
2503  switch (Engine())
2504  {
2505  case TR_VERSION_4:
2506  case TR_VERSION_3:
2507  colorValue /= 16384.0;
2509  break; // just testing -- xythobuz, 20140119
2510 
2511  case TR_VERSION_1:
2512  case TR_VERSION_2:
2513  case TR_VERSION_5:
2514  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
2515  default:
2516  colorValue = (1.0 - (colorValue / 8192.0));
2517  break;
2518  }
2519 
2520 #ifdef MESH_COLORS_SHOULD_BR_RGBA
2521  (*colors)[i*4+0] = colorValue;
2522  (*colors)[i*4+1] = colorValue;
2523  (*colors)[i*4+2] = colorValue;
2524  (*colors)[i*4+3] = 1.0;
2525 #else
2526  (*colors)[i] = colorValue;
2527 #endif
2528  }
2529  }
2530 }

2533 int TombRaider::getRoomBox(unsigned int roomIndex, unsigned int index,
2534  float *xyzA, float *xyzB,
2535  float *xyzC, float *xyzD)

2549  case TR_VERSION_3:

2551  case TR_VERSION_5:
2552  xyzA[0] = (unsigned short)_boxes[index].xmin * 1024.0;
2553  xyzA[1] = (short)_boxes[index].true_floor;
2554  xyzA[2] = (unsigned short)_boxes[index].zmin * 1024.0;
2555 
2556  xyzB[0] = (unsigned short)_boxes[index].xmax * 1024.0;
2557  xyzB[1] = (short)_boxes[index].true_floor;
2558  xyzB[2] = (unsigned short)_boxes[index].zmin * 1024.0;
2559 
2560  xyzC[0] = (unsigned short)_boxes[index].xmax * 1024.0;
2561  xyzC[1] = (short)_boxes[index].true_floor;
2562  xyzC[2] = (unsigned short)_boxes[index].zmax * 1024.0;
2563 
2564  xyzD[0] = (unsigned short)_boxes[index].xmin * 1024.0;
2565  xyzD[1] = (short)_boxes[index].true_floor;
2566  xyzD[2] = (unsigned short)_boxes[index].zmax * 1024.0;
2567  }
2568 
2569  return 0;
2570 }

2595 void TombRaider::getRoomInfo(unsigned int index,
2596  unsigned int *flags, float pos[3],
2597  float bboxMin[3], float bboxMax[3])
2598 {
2599  unsigned int i, n;
2600  float f;
2601 
2602 
2603  if (!isRoomValid(index))
2604  return;
2605 
2606  switch (getEngine())
2607  {
2608  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
2609  break;
2610  case TR_VERSION_5:
2611  // Flags
2612  *flags = mRoomsTR5[index].roomFlag; // Needs to be generic flags in class
2613 
2614  // Positioning
2615  pos[0] = mRoomsTR5[index].roomX;
2616  pos[1] = 0.0f;
2617  pos[2] = mRoomsTR5[index].roomZ;
2618 
2619  // Bounding box setup
2620  bboxMin[0] = 0.0;
2621  bboxMin[1] = 0.0;
2622  bboxMin[2] = 0.0;
2623  bboxMax[0] = 0.0;
2624  bboxMax[1] = 0.0;
2625  bboxMax[2] = 0.0;
2626 
2627  // Bounding Box setup
2628  for (i = 0; i < mRoomsTR5[index].numLayers; ++i)
2629  {
2631 
2632  if (i == 0)
2633  {
2634  bboxMin[0] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxX1;
2635  bboxMin[1] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxY1;
2636  bboxMin[2] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxZ1;
2637 
2638  bboxMax[0] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxX1;
2639  bboxMax[1] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxY2;
2640  bboxMax[2] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxZ2;
2641 
2642  continue;
2643  }
2644 
2645  if (mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxX1 < bboxMin[0])
2646  bboxMin[0] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxX1;
2647 
2648  if (mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxY1 < bboxMin[1])
2649  bboxMin[1] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxY1;
2650 
2651  if (mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxZ1 < bboxMin[2])
2652  bboxMin[2] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxZ1;
2653 
2654 
2655  if (mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxX2 < bboxMax[0])
2656  bboxMax[0] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxX2;
2657 
2658  if (mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxY2 < bboxMax[1])
2659  bboxMax[1] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxY2;
2660 
2661  if (mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxZ2 < bboxMax[2])
2662  bboxMax[2] = mRoomsTR5[index].layers[i].layerBoundingBoxZ2;
2663  }
2664  break;
2665  case TR_VERSION_1:
2666  case TR_VERSION_2:
2667  case TR_VERSION_3:
2668  case TR_VERSION_4:
2669  // Flags
2670  *flags = _rooms[index].flags; // Needs to be generic flags in class
2671 
2672  // Positioning
2673  pos[0] = _rooms[index].info.x;
2674  pos[1] = 0.0f;
2675  pos[2] = _rooms[index].info.z;
2676 
2677  bboxMin[0] = 0.0;
2678  bboxMin[1] = 0.0;
2679  bboxMin[2] = 0.0;
2680  bboxMax[0] = 0.0;
2681  bboxMax[1] = 0.0;
2682  bboxMax[2] = 0.0;
2683 
2684  // Bounding Box setup
2685  n = ((_rooms[index].room_data.num_vertices < 0) ? 0 :
2686  _rooms[index].room_data.num_vertices);
2687 
2688  for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
2689  {
2690  if (i == 0)
2691  {
2692  bboxMin[0] = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].vertex.x;
2693  bboxMin[1] = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].vertex.y;
2694  bboxMin[2] = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].vertex.z;
2695 
2696  bboxMax[0] = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].vertex.x;
2697  bboxMax[1] = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].vertex.y;
2698  bboxMax[2] = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].vertex.z;
2699 
2700  continue;
2701  }
2702 
2703  f = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].vertex.x;
2704 
2705  if (f < bboxMin[0])
2706  bboxMin[0] = f;
2707  if (f > bboxMax[0])
2708  bboxMax[0] = f;
2709 
2710  f = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].vertex.y;
2711 
2712  if (f < bboxMin[1])
2713  bboxMin[1] = f;
2714  if (f > bboxMax[1])
2715  bboxMax[1] = f;
2716 
2717  f = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].vertex.z;
2718 
2719  if (f < bboxMin[2])
2720  bboxMin[2] = f;
2721  if (f > bboxMax[2])
2722  bboxMax[2] = f;
2723  }
2724 
2725  break;
2726  }
2727 }

2730 int TombRaider::getRoomLight(unsigned int roomIndex, unsigned int index,
2731  float pos[4], float color[4], float dir[3],
2732  float *attenuation, float *cutoffAngle,
2733  unsigned int *type, unsigned int *flags)
2734 {
2735  const float dd = 10000.0; // 4095.0;
2736  float f;
2737 
2738 
2739  *flags = 0; // reset
2740 
2741  switch (getEngine())
2742  {
2743  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
2744  return -1;
2745  case TR_VERSION_1:
2746  case TR_VERSION_2:
2747  case TR_VERSION_3:
2748  if (_rooms[roomIndex].num_lights <= 0 ||
2749  (int)index > _rooms[roomIndex].num_lights)
2750  {
2751  return -1;
2752  }
2753 
2754  if (_rooms[roomIndex].lights[index].fade1 == 100730731)
2755  {
2756  f = 1.0;
2757  }
2758  else
2759  {
2760  f = _rooms[roomIndex].lights[index].fade1;
2761  f /= dd;
2762  }
2763 
2764  *attenuation = f;
2765  *flags |= tombraiderLight_useAttenuation;
2766 
2767  pos[0] = _rooms[roomIndex].lights[index].x;
2768  pos[1] = _rooms[roomIndex].lights[index].y;
2769  pos[2] = _rooms[roomIndex].lights[index].z;
2770  pos[3] = 1.0f;
2771 
2772  color[0] = _rooms[roomIndex].lights[index].intensity1 / 409.60;
2773  color[1] = color[0];
2774  color[2] = color[0];
2775  color[3] = 1.0f;
2776 
2777  if (Engine() == TR_VERSION_3)
2778  {
2779  color[0] = _rooms[roomIndex].room_light_colour.r;
2780  color[1] = _rooms[roomIndex].room_light_colour.g;
2781  color[2] = _rooms[roomIndex].room_light_colour.b;
2782  }
2783 
2784  *type = tombraiderLight_typeDirectional;
2785  break;
2786  case TR_VERSION_4:
2787  if (_rooms[roomIndex].num_lights <= 0 ||
2788  (int)index > _rooms[roomIndex].num_lights)
2789  {
2790  return -1;
2791  }
2792 
2793  pos[0] = _rooms[roomIndex].tr4Lights[index].xPosition;
2794  pos[1] = _rooms[roomIndex].tr4Lights[index].yPosition;
2795  pos[2] = _rooms[roomIndex].tr4Lights[index].zPosition;
2796  pos[3] = 0.0f;
2797 
2798  color[0] = _rooms[roomIndex].tr4Lights[index].color.r;
2799  color[1] = _rooms[roomIndex].tr4Lights[index].color.g;
2800  color[2] = _rooms[roomIndex].tr4Lights[index].color.b;
2801 
2802  dir[0] = _rooms[roomIndex].tr4Lights[index].xDir;
2803  dir[1] = _rooms[roomIndex].tr4Lights[index].yDir;
2804  dir[2] = _rooms[roomIndex].tr4Lights[index].zDir;
2805 
2806  *cutoffAngle = _rooms[roomIndex].tr4Lights[index].cutoff;
2807  *flags |= tombraiderLight_useCutoff;
2808 
2809  switch (_rooms[roomIndex].tr4Lights[index].lightType)
2810  {
2811  case 1:
2812  *type = tombraiderLight_typeDirectional;
2813  break;
2814  case 2:
2815  *type = tombraiderLight_typeSpot;
2816  break;
2817  default:
2818  *type = tombraiderLight_typePoint;
2819  }
2820  break;
2821  case TR_VERSION_5:
2822  if (mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].numRoomLights <= 0 ||
2823  (int)index > mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].numRoomLights)
2824  {
2825  return -1;
2826  }
2827 
2828  pos[0] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].lights[index].x;
2829  pos[1] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].lights[index].y;
2830  pos[2] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].lights[index].z;
2831  pos[3] = 0.0f;
2832 
2833  color[0] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].lights[index].red;
2834  color[1] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].lights[index].green;
2835  color[2] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].lights[index].blue;
2836 
2837  dir[0] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].lights[index].directionVectorX;
2838  dir[1] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].lights[index].directionVectorY;
2839  dir[2] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].lights[index].directionVectorZ;
2840 
2841  switch (mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].lights[index].lightType)
2842  {
2843  case 2:
2844  *type = tombraiderLight_typeSpot;
2845  break;
2846  case 3:
2847  *type = tombraiderLight_typeDirectional;
2848  break;
2849  default:
2850  *type = tombraiderLight_typePoint;

3272 void TombRaider::getRoomSprite(unsigned int roomIndex, unsigned int index,
3273  float scale, int *texture,
3274  float *pos, float *vertices, float *texcoords)
3275 {
3276  tr2_sprite_texture_t *sprite;
3277  tr2_vertex_t *vertex;
3278  int t_index, width, height, x, y;
3279  float width2, height2;
3280  unsigned int spriteCount;
3281 
3282 
3283  spriteCount = getRoomSpriteCount(roomIndex);
3284 
3285  if (spriteCount == 0 || index > spriteCount)
3286  return;
3287 
3288  if (scale == 0.0)
3289  scale = 10.0;
3290 
3291  t_index = _rooms[roomIndex].room_data.sprites[index].texture;
3292 
3293  vertex =
3294  &_rooms[roomIndex].room_data.vertices[_rooms[roomIndex].room_data.sprites[index].vertex].vertex;
3295 
3296  sprite = &_sprite_textures[t_index];
3297 
3298  // Info, offset in room added to position
3299  pos[0] = _rooms[roomIndex].info.x + vertex->x;
3300  pos[1] = vertex->y;
3301  pos[2] = _rooms[roomIndex].info.z + vertex->z;
3302  *texture = sprite->tile;
3303 
3304  width = sprite->width >> 8;
3305  height = sprite->height >> 8;
3306  x = sprite->x;
3307  y = sprite->y;
3308  width2 = width * scale; // scale it up a bit (sprites are rather tiny)
3309  height2 = height * scale;
3310 
3311  // Quad
3312  vertices[0] = -width2 / 2.0;
3313  vertices[1] = 0;
3314  vertices[2] = 0;
3315  vertices[3] = -width2 / 2.0;
3316  vertices[4] = -height2;
3317  vertices[5] = 0;
3318  vertices[6] = width2 / 2.0;
3319  vertices[7] = -height2;
3320  vertices[8] = 0;
3321  vertices[9] = width2 / 2.0;
3322  vertices[10] = 0;
3323  vertices[11] = 0;
3324 
3325  texcoords[0] = ((float)y + height) / mTexelScale;
3326  texcoords[1] = (float)(x) / mTexelScale;
3327  texcoords[2] = (float)(y) / mTexelScale;
3328  texcoords[3] = (float)(x) / mTexelScale;
3329  texcoords[4] = (float)(y) / mTexelScale;
3330  texcoords[5] = ((float)x + width) / mTexelScale;
3331  texcoords[6] = ((float)y + height) / mTexelScale;
3332  texcoords[7] = ((float)x + width) / mTexelScale;
3333 }

3356  texcoords = new float[*spriteCount * 8];
3357 
3358  if (scale == 0.0)
3359  scale = 10.0;
3360 
3361  for (i = 0; i < *spriteCount; ++i)
3362  {
3363  t_index = room[index].room_data.sprites[i].texture;
3364 
3365  vertex =
3366  &room[index].room_data.vertices[room[index].room_data.sprites[i].vertex].vertex;
3367 
3368  sprite = &sprite_textures[t_index];
3369 
3370  // Info, offset in room added to position
3371  pos[0+i*3] = room[index].info.x + vertex->x;
3372  pos[1+i*3] = vertex->y;
3373  pos[2+i*3] = room[index].info.z + vertex->z;
3374  textures[i] = sprite->tile;
3375 
3376  width = sprite->width >> 8;
3377  height = sprite->height >> 8;
3378  x = sprite->x;
3379  y = sprite->y;
3380  width2 = width * scale; // scale it up a bit (sprites are rather tiny)
3381  height2 = height * scale;
3382 
3383  // Quad
3384  vertices[0+i*12] = -width2 / 2.0;
3385  vertices[1+i*12] = 0;
3386  vertices[2+i*12] = 0;
3387  vertices[3+i*12] = -width2 / 2.0;
3388  vertices[4+i*12] = -height2;
3389  vertices[5+i*12] = 0;
3390  vertices[6+i*12] = width2 / 2.0;
3391  vertices[7+i*12] = -height2;
3392  vertices[8+i*12] = 0;
3393  vertices[9+i*12] = width2 / 2.0;
3394  vertices[10+i*12] = 0;
3395  vertices[11+i*12] = 0;
3396 
3397  texcoords[0+i*8] = ((float)y + height) / mTexelScale;
3398  texcoords[1+i*8] = (float)(x) / mTexelScale;
3399  texcoords[2+i*8] = (float)(y) / mTexelScale;
3400  texcoords[3+i*8] = (float)(x) / mTexelScale;
3401  texcoords[4+i*8] = (float)(y) / mTexelScale;
3402  texcoords[5+i*8] = ((float)x + width) / mTexelScale;
3403  texcoords[6+i*8] = ((float)y + height) / mTexelScale;
3404  texcoords[7+i*8] = ((float)x + width) / mTexelScale;
3405  }
3406 }
3407 #endif

3617 void TombRaider::getRoomVertex(unsigned int roomIndex,unsigned int vertexIndex,
3618  float *xyz, float *rgba)
3619 {
3620  float color_value;
3621  unsigned int index = roomIndex, i = vertexIndex;
3622  tr2_vertex_t *vertex = 0x0;
3623 
3624 
3625  switch (getEngine())
3626  {
3627  case TR_VERSION_5:
3629  print("getRoomVertex", "Error: No TRC implementation is the answer");
3630  break;
3631  case TR_VERSION_1:
3632  case TR_VERSION_2:
3633  case TR_VERSION_3:
3634  case TR_VERSION_4:
3635  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
3636  default:
3637  vertex = &_rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].vertex;
3638 
3639  xyz[0] = vertex->x;
3640  xyz[1] = vertex->y;
3641  xyz[2] = vertex->z;
3642 
3643  switch (getEngine())
3644  {
3645  case TR_VERSION_1:
3646  color_value = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].attributes;
3647  color_value = (1.1 - (color_value / 8192.0));
3648 
3649  rgba[0] = color_value;
3650  rgba[1] = color_value;
3651  rgba[2] = color_value;
3652  break;
3653  case TR_VERSION_3:
3654  case TR_VERSION_4:
3655  color_value = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].lighting1;
3656  color_value /= 16384.0;
3657 
3658  rgba[0] = color_value + ((float)_rooms[index].room_light_colour.r /
3659  mRoomVertexLightingFactor);
3660 
3661  rgba[1] = color_value + ((float)_rooms[index].room_light_colour.g /
3662  mRoomVertexLightingFactor);
3663 
3664  rgba[2] = color_value + ((float)_rooms[index].room_light_colour.b /
3665  mRoomVertexLightingFactor);
3666  break;
3667  case TR_VERSION_2:
3668  case TR_VERSION_5: // Not really...
3669  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
3670  default:
3671  color_value = _rooms[index].room_data.vertices[i].lighting1;
3672  color_value = (1.1 - (color_value / 8192.0));
3673 
3674  rgba[0] = color_value;
3675  rgba[1] = color_value;
3676  rgba[2] = color_value;
3677  }
3678 
3679  // Underwater rooms have an ambient color with a shade of blue
3680  if (_rooms[index].flags & 0x0001)
3681  {
3682  rgba[0] *= 0.6;
3683  rgba[2] *= 1.2;
3684  }
3685 
3686  // Alpha color
3687  rgba[3] = 1.0;
3688  }
3689 }

3692 void TombRaider::getRoomVertexArrays(unsigned int roomIndex,
3693  unsigned int *vertexCount, float **vertices,
3694  unsigned int *normalCount, float **normals,
3695  unsigned int *colorCount, float **colors)
3696 {
3697  float color_value;
3698  float rgba[4];
3699  unsigned int i, j, k, count;
3700  unsigned char c;
3701  tr2_vertex_t *vertex = 0x0;
3702 
3703 
3704  count = getRoomVertexCount(roomIndex);
3705 
3706  *vertexCount = 0;
3707  *vertices = 0x0;
3708  *normalCount = 0;
3709  *normals = 0x0;
3710  *colorCount = 0;
3711  *colors = 0x0;
3712 
3713  if (count == 0)
3714  return;
3715 
3716  switch (getEngine())
3717  {
3718  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
3719  default:
3720  break;
3721  case TR_VERSION_5:
3722  *vertexCount = count;
3723  *vertices = new float[count*3];
3724  *normalCount = count;
3725  *normals = new float[count*3];
3726  *colorCount = count;
3727  *colors = new float[count*4];
3728 
3729  for (i = 0, k = 0; i < mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].numLayers; ++i)
3730  {
3731  for (j = 0; j < mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].layers[i].numLayerVertices; ++j)
3732  {
3733  (*vertices)[k*3] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].faces[i].verts[j].x;
3734  (*vertices)[k*3+1] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].faces[i].verts[j].y;
3735  (*vertices)[k*3+2] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].faces[i].verts[j].z;
3736 
3737  (*normals)[k*3] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].faces[i].verts[j].nx;
3738  (*normals)[k*3+1] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].faces[i].verts[j].ny;
3739  (*normals)[k*3+2] = mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].faces[i].verts[j].nz;
3740 
3742  c = ((unsigned char *)&mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].faces[i].verts[j].vColor)[1];
3743  (*colors)[k*4] = (float)c / 255.0f;
3744  c = ((unsigned char *)&mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].faces[i].verts[j].vColor)[2];
3745  (*colors)[k*4+1] = (float)c / 255.0f;
3746  c = ((unsigned char *)&mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].faces[i].verts[j].vColor)[3];
3747  (*colors)[k*4+2] = (float)c / 255.0f;
3748  c = ((unsigned char *)&mRoomsTR5[roomIndex].faces[i].verts[j].vColor)[0];
3749  (*colors)[k*4+3] = (float)c / 255.0f;
3750  }
3751  }
3752  break;
3753  case TR_VERSION_1:
3754  case TR_VERSION_2:
3755  case TR_VERSION_3:
3756  case TR_VERSION_4:
3757  *vertexCount = count;
3758  *vertices = new float[count*3];
3759  *normalCount = 0;
3760  *normals = 0x0;
3761  *colorCount = count;
3762  *colors = new float[count*4];
3763 
3764  // Setup vertex coloring and vertices
3765  for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
3766  {
3767  vertex = &_rooms[roomIndex].room_data.vertices[i].vertex;
3768 
3769  (*vertices)[i*3] = vertex->x;
3770  (*vertices)[i*3+1] = vertex->y;
3771  (*vertices)[i*3+2] = vertex->z;
3772 
3773  switch (getEngine())
3774  {
3775  case TR_VERSION_1:
3776  color_value = _rooms[roomIndex].room_data.vertices[i].attributes;
3777  color_value = (1.1 - (color_value / 8192.0));
3778  break;
3779  case TR_VERSION_4:
3780  case TR_VERSION_3:
3781  color_value = _rooms[roomIndex].room_data.vertices[i].lighting1;
3782  color_value /= 16384.0;
3783  break;
3784  case TR_VERSION_2:
3785  case TR_VERSION_5:
3786  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
3787  default:
3788  color_value = _rooms[roomIndex].room_data.vertices[i].lighting1;
3789  color_value = (1.1 - (color_value / 8192.0));
3790  }
3791 
3792  switch (getEngine())
3793  {
3794  case TR_VERSION_4:
3795  case TR_VERSION_3:
3796  rgba[0] = (color_value +
3797  ((float)_rooms[roomIndex].room_light_colour.r /
3798  mRoomVertexLightingFactor));
3799 
3800  rgba[1] = (color_value +
3801  ((float)_rooms[roomIndex].room_light_colour.g /
3802  mRoomVertexLightingFactor));
3803 
3804  rgba[2] = (color_value +
3805  ((float)_rooms[roomIndex].room_light_colour.b /
3806  mRoomVertexLightingFactor));
3807  break;
3808  case TR_VERSION_1:
3809  case TR_VERSION_2:
3810  case TR_VERSION_5:
3811  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
3812  default:
3813  rgba[0] = color_value;
3814  rgba[1] = color_value;
3815  rgba[2] = color_value;
3816  }
3817 
3818  // Underwater rooms have an ambient color with a shade of blue
3819  if (_rooms[roomIndex].flags & 0x0001)
3820  {
3821  rgba[0] *= 0.6;
3822  rgba[2] *= 1.2;
3823  }
3824 
3825  // Alpha color
3826  rgba[3] = 1.0;
3827 
3828  (*colors)[i*4] = rgba[0];
3829  (*colors)[i*4+1] = rgba[1];
3830  (*colors)[i*4+2] = rgba[2];
3831  (*colors)[i*4+3] = rgba[3];
3832  }
3833  }
3834 }

3906  break;
3907  }
3908  }
3909  }
3910

4004 
4005  sprite[l].texel[0].st[0] = (double)(x) / mTexelScale;
4006  sprite[l].texel[0].st[1] = (double)(y+height) / mTexelScale;
4007 
4008  printf(".");
4009  fflush(stdout);
4010  }
4011  }
4012  }
4013  }
4014 
4015  printf("\n");
4016 #endif
4017 }
4018 
4019 
4020 void TombRaider::getSoundSample(unsigned int index,
4021  unsigned int *bytes, unsigned char **data)
4022 {
4023  unsigned char *riff;
4024  unsigned int offset, altIndex;
4025 
4026  *bytes = 0;
4027  *data = 0x0;
4028 
4029  switch (Engine())
4030  {
4031  case TR_VERSION_1:
4033  getRiffData(bytes, &riff);
4034 
4035  if (riff && (int)index < mNumSampleIndices)
4036  {
4037  offset = mSampleIndices[index];
4038 
4039  if ((int)index < mNumSampleIndices - 1)
4040  {
4041  *bytes = mSampleIndices[index+1] - mSampleIndices[index];
4042  }
4043  else
4044  {
4045  *bytes = *bytes - mSampleIndices[index];
4046  }
4047 
4048  *data = new unsigned char[*bytes];
4049 
4050  memcpy(*data, riff+offset, *bytes);
4051  }
4052 
4053  if (riff)
4054  {
4055  delete [] riff;
4056  }
4057  break;
4058  case TR_VERSION_2:
4059  case TR_VERSION_3:
4060  if (mRiffAlternateLoaded &&
4061  mRiffData && mRiffAlternateOffsets && (int)index < mNumSampleIndices)
4062  {
4063  altIndex = mSampleIndices[index];
4064 
4065  offset = mRiffAlternateOffsets[altIndex];
4066 
4067  if ((int)offset > mRiffDataSz)
4068  {
4069  print("getSoundSample", "WARNING: offset too large, may be mismatched SFX and game pak, handling...\n");
4070  return;
4071  }
4072 
4073  if (altIndex < mNumTR4Samples - 1)
4074  {
4075  *bytes = mRiffAlternateOffsets[altIndex+1] - offset;
4076  }
4077  else
4078  {
4079  *bytes = mRiffDataSz - offset;
4080  }
4081 
4082  *data = new unsigned char[*bytes];
4083 
4084  memcpy(*data, mRiffData+offset, *bytes);
4085  }
4086  break;
4087  case TR_VERSION_4:
4088  case TR_VERSION_5:
4089  getRiffDataTR4(index, bytes, data);
4090  break;
4091  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
4092  default:
4093  ;
4094  }
4095 }
4096

4098 unsigned int TombRaider::getSoundSamplesCount()
4099 {
4100  unsigned int count = 0;
4101 
4102 
4103  switch (Engine())
4104  {
4105  case TR_VERSION_1:
4106  count = mNumSampleIndices;
4107  break;
4108  case TR_VERSION_2:
4109  case TR_VERSION_3:
4110  if (mRiffAlternateLoaded)
4111  {
4112  count = mNumSampleIndices;
4113  }
4114  break;
4115  case TR_VERSION_4:
4116  case TR_VERSION_5:
4117  count = mNumTR4Samples;
4118  break;
4119  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
4120  default:
4121  count = 0;
4122  }
4123 
4124  return count;
4125 }

4133  mMeshes[index].vertices == NULL)));

4136 
4137 bool TombRaider::isRoomValid(int index)
4138 {
4139  // Yes, you MUST support signed indices due to legacy engines
4140  if (index < 0)
4141  return false;
4142 
4143  switch (getEngine())
4144  {
4145  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
4146  default:
4147  break;
4148  case TR_VERSION_5:
4149  if (index < _num_rooms &&
4150  //mRoomsTR5[index].roomX != 0xcdcdcd &&
4151  //mRoomsTR5[index].roomZ != 0xcdcdcd)
4152  *((int *)&mRoomsTR5[index].roomX) != 0xcdcdcd &&
4153  *((int *)&mRoomsTR5[index].roomZ) != 0xcdcdcd)
4154  // Cast to int * as it was comparing with float 0xcdcdcd before
4155  // -- xythobuz
4156  {
4157  return true;
4158  }
4159  break;
4160  case TR_VERSION_1:
4161  case TR_VERSION_2:
4162  case TR_VERSION_3:
4163  case TR_VERSION_4:
4164  if (index < _num_rooms &&
4165  _rooms[index].room_data.num_vertices > 0)
4166  {
4167  return true;
4168  }
4169  }
4170 
4171  return false;
4172 }

4179 int TombRaider::loadSFX(char *filename)
4180 {
4181  FILE *f = fopen(filename, "rb");
4182  long bytes = 0;
4183  unsigned char *data;
4184 
4185  if (!f)
4186  {
4187  perror("Couldn't load SFX file");
4188  return -1;
4189  }
4190 
4191  fseek(f, 0L, SEEK_END);
4192  bytes = ftell(f);
4193  fseek(f, 0L, SEEK_SET);
4194 
4195  if (bytes > 8)
4196  {
4197  data = new unsigned char[bytes];
4198  fread(data, bytes, 1, f);
4199 
4200  mNumTR4Samples = getRiffOffsets(data, bytes,
4201  &mRiffAlternateOffsets,
4202  mNumSampleIndices);
4203 
4204  // This SFX must not come close to matching this game pak
4205  if ((int)mNumTR4Samples < mNumSampleIndices)
4206  {
4207  delete [] data;
4208  fclose(f);
4209 
4210  print("loadSFX", "WARNING: SFX RIFF has less than pak's RIFF count\n");
4211  return -2;
4212  }
4213 
4214  // If you ran out of room, then reallocate and parse agian =(
4215  if (mNumSampleIndices < (int)mNumTR4Samples)
4216  {
4217  delete [] mRiffAlternateOffsets;
4218 
4219  mNumTR4Samples = getRiffOffsets(data, bytes,
4220  &mRiffAlternateOffsets,
4221  mNumTR4Samples);
4222  }
4223 
4224  mRiffDataSz = bytes;
4225  mRiffData = data;
4226  mRiffAlternateLoaded = true;
4227  }
4228 
4229  fclose(f);
4230 
4231  return 0;
4232 }

4519 void TombRaider::extractMeshes(unsigned char *mesh_data,
4520  unsigned int num_mesh_pointers,
4521  unsigned int *mesh_pointers)
4522 {
4523  unsigned int size, i;
4524  unsigned char *mesh_pointer;
4525  int negative_size;
4526 
4527 
4528  /* Alloc space for mesh */
4529  mMeshCount = num_mesh_pointers;
4530 
4531  printDebug("ExtractMeshes", "mMeshCount = %u", mMeshCount);
4532 
4533  mMeshes = new tr2_mesh_t[mMeshCount];
4534 
4535  printDebug("ExtractMeshes", "num_mesh_pointers = %u", num_mesh_pointers);
4536 
4537  for (i = 0; i < num_mesh_pointers; ++i)
4538  {
4539  /* Get mesh start */
4540  mesh_pointer = &mesh_data[mesh_pointers[i]];
4541 
4542  /* Get Centre + Unknowns */
4543  memcpy(&mMeshes[i].centre.x, mesh_pointer, 10);
4545 
4546  // depending on the interpretation of the unknowns that follow the Centre
4547  // element, more endian conversion may be necessary
4548  mesh_pointer += 10;
4549 
4550  /* Get number of vertices */
4551  memcpy(&mMeshes[i].num_vertices, mesh_pointer, 2);
4553 
4554  printDebug("ExtractMeshes", "mMeshes[%i].num_vertices = %u",
4555  i, mMeshes[i].num_vertices);
4556 
4557  mesh_pointer += sizeof(unsigned short);
4558  mMeshes[i].num_vertices = (short)abs(mMeshes[i].num_vertices);
4559 
4560  /* Get vertex list */
4561  size = sizeof(tr2_vertex_t) * mMeshes[i].num_vertices;
4562  mMeshes[i].vertices = 0x0;
4563 
4564  if (mMeshes[i].num_vertices > 0)
4565  mMeshes[i].vertices = new tr2_vertex_t[mMeshes[i].num_vertices];
4566 
4567  memcpy(mMeshes[i].vertices, mesh_pointer, size);
4569 
4570  mesh_pointer += size;
4571 
4572  /* Get number of normals */
4573  memcpy(&mMeshes[i].num_normals, mesh_pointer, sizeof(unsigned short));
4575 
4576  mesh_pointer += sizeof(unsigned short);
4577  negative_size = (mMeshes[i].num_normals < 0);
4578  mMeshes[i].num_normals = (short)abs(mMeshes[i].num_normals);
4579 
4580  printDebug("ExtractMeshes", "negative_size = %u", negative_size);
4581 
4582  mMeshes[i].mesh_lights = 0x0;
4583  mMeshes[i].normals = 0x0;
4584 
4585  /* Get normal list */
4586  if (negative_size)
4587  {
4588  negative_size = 0;
4589 
4590  size = mMeshes[i].num_normals * sizeof(unsigned short);
4591 
4592  mMeshes[i].mesh_lights = 0x0;
4593 
4594  if (mMeshes[i].num_normals > 0)
4595  mMeshes[i].mesh_lights = new short[mMeshes[i].num_normals];
4596 
4597  memcpy(mMeshes[i].mesh_lights, mesh_pointer, size);
4598  }
4599  else
4600  {
4601  size = sizeof(tr2_vertex_t) * mMeshes[i].num_normals;
4602 
4603  mMeshes[i].normals = 0x0;
4604 
4605  if (mMeshes[i].num_normals > 0)
4606  mMeshes[i].normals = new tr2_vertex_t[mMeshes[i].num_normals];
4607 
4608  memcpy(mMeshes[i].normals, mesh_pointer, size);
4609  }
4611 
4612  mesh_pointer += size;
4613 
4614  /* Get number of textured rectangles */
4615  memcpy(&mMeshes[i].num_textured_rectangles,
4616  mesh_pointer, sizeof(unsigned short));
4618 
4619  mesh_pointer += sizeof(unsigned short);
4620  mMeshes[i].num_textured_rectangles =
4621  (short)abs(mMeshes[i].num_textured_rectangles);
4622 
4623  size = sizeof(tr2_quad_t) * mMeshes[i].num_textured_rectangles;
4624 
4625  mMeshes[i].textured_rectangles = 0x0;
4626 
4627  if (mMeshes[i].num_textured_rectangles > 0)
4628  mMeshes[i].textured_rectangles =
4629  new tr2_quad_t[mMeshes[i].num_textured_rectangles];
4630 
4631  printDebug("ExtractMeshes", "mMeshes[%i].num_textured_rectangles = %u",
4632  i, mMeshes[i].num_textured_rectangles);
4633

4635  if (mMeshes[i].num_textured_rectangles > 0)
4636  {
4637  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_4)
4638  {
4639  int j;
4640 
4641  for (j = 0; j < mMeshes[i].num_textured_rectangles; ++j)
4642  {
4643  memcpy(&mMeshes[i].textured_rectangles[j],
4644  mesh_pointer, sizeof(tr2_quad_t));
4645  mesh_pointer += sizeof(tr2_quad_t) + sizeof(unsigned short);
4646  }
4647  }
4648  else
4649  {
4650  memcpy(mMeshes[i].textured_rectangles, mesh_pointer, size);
4651  }

4655  mesh_pointer += size;

4660  mesh_pointer, sizeof(unsigned short));
4662 
4663  mesh_pointer += sizeof(unsigned short);
4664  mMeshes[i].num_textured_triangles =
4665  (short)abs(mMeshes[i].num_textured_triangles);
4666

4668 
4669  //if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_4)
4670  // size += 2 * mMeshes[i].num_textured_triangles;
4671

4673

4675  {

4678  }
4679

4681  i, mMeshes[i].num_textured_triangles);
4682

4684  if (mMeshes[i].num_textured_triangles > 0)
4685  {
4686  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_4)
4687  {
4688  int j;

4699  memcpy(mMeshes[i].textured_triangles, mesh_pointer, size);
4700  }
4702

4704  mesh_pointer += size;
4705  }
4706 
4707  if (mEngineVersion == TR_VERSION_4)
4708  {
4709  mMeshes[i].num_coloured_rectangles = 0;
4710  mMeshes[i].num_coloured_triangles = 0;
4711  mMeshes[i].coloured_rectangles = 0x0;
4712  mMeshes[i].coloured_triangles = 0x0;

4716  continue;

4724  mMeshes[i].num_coloured_rectangles =
4725  (short)abs(mMeshes[i].num_coloured_rectangles);

4736  i, mMeshes[i].num_coloured_rectangles);
4737 
4738  /* Get list of coloured rectangles */
4739  if (mMeshes[i].num_coloured_rectangles > 0)
4740  {
4741  memcpy(mMeshes[i].coloured_rectangles, mesh_pointer, size);
4743  mesh_pointer += size;
4744  }
4745 
4746  /* Get number of coloured triangles */
4747  memcpy(&mMeshes[i].num_coloured_triangles, mesh_pointer,
4748  sizeof(unsigned short));
4750 
4751  mesh_pointer += sizeof(unsigned short);
4752  mMeshes[i].num_coloured_triangles =
4753  (short)abs(mMeshes[i].num_coloured_triangles);
4754 
4755  size = sizeof(tr2_tri_t) * mMeshes[i].num_coloured_triangles;
4756 
4757  mMeshes[i].coloured_triangles = 0x0;
4758 
4759  if (mMeshes[i].num_coloured_triangles > 0)
4760  mMeshes[i].coloured_triangles =
4761  new tr2_tri_t[mMeshes[i].num_coloured_triangles];
4762 
4763  printDebug("ExtractMeshes", "mMeshes[%i].num_coloured_triangles = %u",
4764  i, mMeshes[i].num_coloured_triangles);
4765 
4766  /* Get list of coloured triangles */
4767  if (mMeshes[i].num_coloured_triangles > 0)
4768  {
4769  memcpy(mMeshes[i].coloured_triangles, mesh_pointer, size);
4771 
4772  mesh_pointer += size;
4773  }
4774  }
4775 }

4778 int TombRaider::Fread(void *buffer, size_t size, size_t count, FILE *f)
4779 {
4780 #ifdef ZLIB_SUPPORT
4781  int num_read;
4782 
4783 
4784  if (mFreadMode == TR_FREAD_COMPRESSED)
4785  {
4786  num_read = count;
4787  num_read *= size;
4788 
4789  if ((mCompressedLevelDataOffset + num_read) <= mCompressedLevelSize)
4790  {
4791  memcpy(buffer, &mCompressedLevelData[mCompressedLevelDataOffset],
4792  num_read);
4793 
4794  mCompressedLevelDataOffset += num_read;
4795 
4796  return count;
4797  }
4798  else
4799  {
4800  print("Fread(%p, %d, %d, %p)", "ERROR: Returned %d bytes too far",
4801  buffer, size, count, f, num_read);
4802  reset();
4803  exit(2);
4804  }
4805  }
4806 #endif
4807  unsigned int offset = ftell(f);
4808 
4809  if (fread(buffer, size, count, f) != count)
4810  {
4811  print("Fread", "ERROR: Failed fread. Should Abort. @ 0x%x", offset);
4812  reset();
4813  exit(2);
4814  // return -1; // Unreachable anyways
4815  }
4816 
4817  return count;
4818 }

4851 
4852 int TombRaider::getRiffOffsets(unsigned char *riffData,
4853  unsigned int riffDataBytes,
4854  unsigned int **offsets,
4855  unsigned int numOffsets)
4856 {
4857  unsigned int i, j = 0, riffCount, state;
4858 
4859  *offsets = new unsigned int[numOffsets];
4860 
4861  for (i = 0, riffCount = 0, state = 4; i < riffDataBytes; ++i)
4862  {
4863  switch (riffData[i])
4864  {
4865  case 'R':
4866  if (state == 4)
4867  {
4868  j = i; // tmp offset guess
4869  state = 0;
4870  continue;
4871  }
4872  break;
4873  case 'I':
4874  if (state == 0)
4875  {
4876  state = 1;
4877  continue;
4878  }
4879  break;
4880  case 'F':
4881  if (state == 1)
4882  {
4883  state = 2;
4884  continue;
4885  }
4886  else if (state == 2)
4887  {
4888  state = 3;
4889 
4890  // Found RIFF header, but we can only report
4891  // riffCount offsets ( buffer size limits )
4892  if (riffCount < numOffsets)
4893  {
4894  (*offsets)[riffCount] = j;
4895  }
4896 
4897  ++riffCount;
4898  continue;
4899  }
4900  break;
4901  }
4902 
4903  state = 4;
4904  }
4905 
4906  return riffCount;
4907 }
