4909 
4910 unsigned char *TombRaider::getTexTile(int texture)
4911 {
4912  unsigned char *image;
4913  unsigned int color;
4914  int j, k, index, offset;
4915  int xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, x, y;
4916 
4917 
4918  image = NULL;
4919 
4920  if (texture >=0 && texture < (int)_num_textiles)
4921  {
4922  image = new unsigned char[256*256*4];
4923  memset(image, 0, 256*256*4);
4924 
4925  if (_textile32)
4926  {
4927  // Convert 32bit BGRA image format to 32bit RGBA
4928  for (j = 0; j < 256; j++)
4929  {
4930  for (k = 0; k < 256; k++)
4931  {
4932  index = (j * 256) + k;
4933  color = _textile32[texture].tile[index];
4934  index = (j * 1024) + (k * 4);
4935 
4936  image[index + 2] = *((unsigned char *)(&color));
4937  image[index + 1] = *((unsigned char *)(&color)+1);
4938  image[index + 0] = *((unsigned char *)(&color)+2);
4939  image[index + 3] = *((unsigned char *)(&color)+3);
4940  }
4941  }
4942  }
4943  else
4944  {
4945  // Convert 16bit ARGB image format to 32bit RGBA
4946  for (j = 0; j < 256; j++)
4947  {
4948  for (k = 0; k < 256; k++)
4949  {
4950  index = (j * 256) + k;
4951  offset = _textile16[texture].tile[index];
4952  index = (j * 1024) + (k * 4);
4953 
4954  image[index + 0] = ((offset >> 10) & 0x1f) * 8;
4955  image[index + 1] = ((offset >> 5) & 0x1f) * 8;
4956  image[index + 2] = (offset & 0x1f) * 8;
4957  image[index + 3] = (offset & 0x8000) ? 0xFF : 0;
4958  }
4959  }
4960  }
4961 
4962  switch (Engine())
4963  {
4964  case TR_VERSION_4:
4965  case TR_VERSION_3: // Account for alpha flags
4966  for (j = 0; j < (int)_num_object_textures; j++)
4967  {
4969 #ifdef FIXME
4970  if (_object_textures[j].tile == texture &&
4971  _object_textures[j].transparency_flags == 1)
4972  {
4973  xmin = 999;
4974  xmax = 0;
4975  ymin = 999;
4976  ymax = 0;
4977  y = 4;
4978 
4979  // Account for triangles
4980  if (_object_textures[j].vertices[3].xpixel == 0 &&
4981  _object_textures[j].vertices[3].ypixel == 0)
4982  y = 3;
4983 
4984  for (k = 0; k < y; k++)
4985  {
4986  if (_object_textures[j].vertices[k].xpixel > xmax)
4987  xmax = _object_textures[j].vertices[k].xpixel;
4988 
4989  if (_object_textures[j].vertices[k].xpixel < xmin)
4990  xmin = _object_textures[j].vertices[k].xpixel;
4991 
4992  if (_object_textures[j].vertices[k].ypixel > ymax)
4993  ymax = _object_textures[j].vertices[k].ypixel;
4994 
4995  if (_object_textures[j].vertices[k].ypixel < ymin)
4996  ymin = _object_textures[j].vertices[k].ypixel;
4997  }
4998 
4999  for (x = xmin; x <= xmax; x++)
5000  {
5001  for (y = ymin; y <= ymax; y++)
5002  {
5003  index = (y * 256) + x;
5004  offset = _textile16[texture].tile[index];
5005  index = (y * 1024) + (x * 4);
5006 
5007  image[index + 0] = ((offset >> 10) & 0x1f) * 8;
5008  image[index + 1] = ((offset >> 5) & 0x1f) * 8;
5009  image[index + 2] = (offset & 0x1f) * 8;
5010 
5011  // Set transparency to full
5012  if (offset & 0x8000)
5013  {
5014  image[index + 3] = 0x00;
5015  }
5016  }
5017  }
5018  }
5019  else
5020 #endif
5021  if (_object_textures[j].tile == texture &&
5022  _object_textures[j].transparency_flags == 2)
5023  {
5024  xmin = 999;
5025  xmax = 0;
5026  ymin = 999;
5027  ymax = 0;
5028  y = 4;
5029 
5030  // Account for triangles
5031  if (_object_textures[j].vertices[3].xpixel == 0 &&
5032  _object_textures[j].vertices[3].ypixel == 0)
5033  y = 3;
5034 
5035  for (k = 0; k < y; k++)
5036  {
5037  if (_object_textures[j].vertices[k].xpixel > xmax)
5038  xmax = _object_textures[j].vertices[k].xpixel;
5039 
5040  if (_object_textures[j].vertices[k].xpixel < xmin)
5041  xmin = _object_textures[j].vertices[k].xpixel;
5042 
5043  if (_object_textures[j].vertices[k].ypixel > ymax)
5044  ymax = _object_textures[j].vertices[k].ypixel;
5045 
5046  if (_object_textures[j].vertices[k].ypixel < ymin)
5047  ymin = _object_textures[j].vertices[k].ypixel;
5048  }
5049 
5050  for (x = xmin; x <= xmax; x++)
5051  {
5052  for (y = ymin; y <= ymax; y++)
5053  {
5054  if (_textile32)
5055  {
5056  index = (y * 256) + x;
5057  color = _textile32[texture].tile[index];
5058  index = (y * 1024) + (x * 4);
5059 
5060  image[index + 2] = *((unsigned char *)(&color));
5061  image[index + 1] = *((unsigned char *)(&color)+1);
5062  image[index + 0] = *((unsigned char *)(&color)+2);
5063  image[index + 3] = *((unsigned char *)(&color)+3);
5064 
5065  k = image[index] + image[index + 1] + image[index + 2];
5066 
5067  // Set transparency based upon intensity
5068  image[index + 3] = (k / 3);
5069  }
5070  else
5071  {
5072  index = (y * 256) + x;
5073  offset = _textile16[texture].tile[index];
5074  index = (y * 1024) + (x * 4);
5075 
5076  image[index + 0] = ((offset >> 10) & 0x1f) * 8;
5077  image[index + 1] = ((offset >> 5) & 0x1f) * 8;
5078  image[index + 2] = (offset & 0x1f) * 8;
5079  image[index + 3] = (offset & 0x8000) ? 0xFF : 0;
5080 
5081  k = image[index] + image[index + 1] + image[index + 2];
5082 
5083  // Set transparency based upon intensity
5084  if (offset & 0x8000)
5085  image[index + 3] = (k / 3);
5086  else
5087  image[index + 3] = 0;
5088  }
5089  }
5090  }
5091  }
5092  }
5093  break;
5094  case TR_VERSION_1:
5095  case TR_VERSION_2:
5096  case TR_VERSION_5:
5097  case TR_VERSION_UNKNOWN:
5098  default:
5099  ;
5100  }
5101  }
5102 
5103  return image;
5104 }

5108 int TombRaider::loadTR5(FILE *f, void (*percent)(int))
5109 {
5110  unsigned int level_data_sz, riffOffset, seperator0;
5111  unsigned int portalOffset, nextRoomOffset, thisRoomOffset;
5112  int i, j, k;
5113  u_int16_t us;
5114 
5115  u_int32_t numMeshData, numMeshPointers, u;
5116  u_int32_t *meshPointers;
5117  u_int8_t *meshData;
5118  char check[32];
5119 
5120  if (percent)
5121  (*percent)(5);
5122 
5123  printDebug("Load", "mEngineVersion = 0x%x", mPakVersion);
5124 
5125  if (mEngineVersion != TR_VERSION_5)
5126  return -1;
5127 
5128 #ifdef ZLIB_SUPPORT
5129  unsigned int sz, usz; // compressed and uncompressed size
5130  unsigned char *compressed_data = NULL;
5131  int zerr;
5132  uLongf foo;
5133 
5134 
5135  // Read texture type offsets
5136  Fread(&_num_room_textures, 2, 1, f);
5137  printDebug("LoadTR5", "_num_room_textures = %u", _num_room_textures);
5138  Fread(&_num_misc_textures, 2, 1, f);
5139  printDebug("LoadTR5", "_num_misc_textures = %u", _num_misc_textures);
5140  Fread(&_num_bump_map_textures, 2, 1, f);
5141  printDebug("LoadTR5", "_num_bump_map_textures = %u", _num_bump_map_textures);
5142 
5143 
5144  // Read the sizes of the 32-bit textures
5145  Fread(&usz, sizeof(usz), 1, f);
5146  Fread(&sz, sizeof(sz), 1, f);
5147 
5148  printDebug("LoadTR5", "32-bit textures compressed size = %u bytes", sz);
5149  printDebug("LoadTR5", "32-bit textures uncompressed size = %u bytes", usz);
5150 
5151  _num_textiles = usz / sizeof(tr2_textile32_t);
5152 
5153  printDebug("LoadTR5", "_num_textiles = %i/%i = %i",
5154  usz, sizeof(tr2_textile32_t), _num_textiles);
5155 
5156  _textile32 = new tr2_textile32_t[_num_textiles];
5157 
5158  // Allocate a temporary buffer for decompression
5159  compressed_data = new unsigned char[sz];
5160  Fread(compressed_data, sz, 1, f);
5161 
5162  // Decompress the textures
5163  foo = usz;
5164  zerr = uncompress((unsigned char *)_textile32,
5165  &foo,
5166  compressed_data,
5167  sz);
5168  usz = foo;
5169 
5170  printDebug("LoadTR5", "textile decompress [%s]",
5171  (zerr == Z_OK) ? "OK" : "ERROR");
5172 
5173  switch (zerr)
5174  {
5175  case Z_MEM_ERROR:
5176  printDebug("LoadTR5", "There was not enough memory");
5177  break;
5178  case Z_BUF_ERROR:
5179  printDebug("LoadTR5", "There was not enough room in the output buffer");
5180  break;
5181  case Z_DATA_ERROR:
5182  printDebug("LoadTR5", "The input data was corrupted");
5183  break;
5184  default:
5185  printDebug("LoadTR5", "textile decompress %i", zerr);
5186  }
5187 
5188  // Free the temporary buffer
5189  delete [] compressed_data;
5190 
5191  // Read in the 16-bit textures, set NumTextiles
5192  Fread(&usz, sizeof(usz), 1, f);
5193  Fread(&sz, sizeof(sz), 1, f);
5194 
5195  printDebug("LoadTR5", "16-bit textures compressed size = %u bytes", sz);
5196  printDebug("LoadTR5", "16-bit textures uncompressed size = %u bytes", usz);
5197 
5198  _num_textiles = usz / sizeof(tr2_textile16_t);
5199 
5200  printDebug("LoadTR5", "_num_textiles = %i/%i = %i",
5201  usz, sizeof(tr2_textile16_t), _num_textiles);
5202 
5203  _textile16 = new tr2_textile16_t[_num_textiles];
5204 
5205  // Allocate a temporary buffer for decompression
5206  compressed_data = new unsigned char[sz];
5207  Fread(compressed_data, sz, 1, f);
5208 
5209  // Decompress the textures
5210  foo = usz;
5211  zerr = uncompress((unsigned char *)_textile16,
5212  &foo,
5213  compressed_data,
5214  sz);
5215  usz = foo;
5216 
5217  if (percent)
5218  (*percent)(7);
5219 
5220  printDebug("LoadTR5", "textile decompress [%s]",
5221  (zerr == Z_OK) ? "OK" : "ERROR");
5222 
5223  switch (zerr)
5224  {
5225  case Z_MEM_ERROR:
5226  printDebug("LoadTR5", "There was not enough memory");
5227  break;
5228  case Z_BUF_ERROR:
5229  printDebug("LoadTR5", "There was not enough room in the output buffer");
5230  break;
5231  case Z_DATA_ERROR:
5232  printDebug("LoadTR5", "The input data was corrupted");
5233  break;
5234  default:
5235  printDebug("LoadTR5", "textile decompress %i", zerr);

5240

5285  break;

6298 
6299  printDebug("Load", " %c%c%c%c should be RIFF",
6300  compressedSoundSample[0],
6301  compressedSoundSample[1],
6302  compressedSoundSample[2],
6303  compressedSoundSample[3]);
6304 
6305  // Decompress the sample
6306  libzUncompressedSize = sizeUncompressed;
6307 
6308  zErr = uncompress(unCompressedSoundSample,
6309  &libzUncompressedSize,
6310  compressedSoundSample,
6311  sizeCompressed);
6312 
6313  sizeUncompressed = libzUncompressedSize;
6314 
6315  switch (zErr)
6316  {
6317  case Z_MEM_ERROR:
6318  printDebug("Load", " Decompress Error: not enough memory");
6319  break;
6320  case Z_BUF_ERROR:
6321  printDebug("Load", " Decompress Error: output buffer too small");
6322  break;
6323  case Z_DATA_ERROR:
6324  printDebug("Load", " Decompress Error: input data was corrupted");
6325  break;
6326  case Z_OK:
6327  printDebug("Load", " Decompress OK");
6328  break;
6329  default:
6330  printDebug("Load", " Decompress Error: decompress error #%i", zErr);
6331  }
6332 
6333  // Hhhmm... handle uncompressed RIFFs too?
6334  if (zErr == Z_OK)
6335  {
6336  mTR4Samples[i] = unCompressedSoundSample;
6337  mTR4SamplesSz[i] = sizeUncompressed;
6338  delete [] compressedSoundSample;
6339  }
6340  else
6341  {
6342  printDebug("Load", " %lubytes read from file", ftell(f));
6343  mTR4Samples[i] = compressedSoundSample;
6344  mTR4SamplesSz[i] = sizeCompressed;
6345  delete [] unCompressedSoundSample;
6346  }
6347  }
6348 
6349  fclose(f);
6350 
6351  return 0;
6352 }

6360  fprintf(stderr, "TombRaider::%s> ", methodName);
6361  vfprintf(stderr, s, args);
6362  fprintf(stderr, "\n");
6363  va_end(args);
6364 }
